contact.summary:
Robynn Storey, CEO of Storeyline Resumes, pioneer of innovative executive resume writing and holistic career services. 

Her visionary leadership bridges job seekers to dream careers through tailored resumes, interview coaching, LinkedIn optimization, and counseling. 

A sought-after speaker and media guest,  Robynn redefines professional success, leaving an indelible mark on job seekers worldwide. 

Guided by Storey's dynamic leadership, Storeyline Resumes has risen as a top hub for those seeking expert resume aid. 

Fueled by a deep grasp of industry dynamics and employer demands, Storey and her team have shaped hundreds of thousands of resumes, unlocking fresh pathways for job seekers around the globe.

Her unwavering dedication to excellence has etched Storeyline Resumes' name as a renowned source for bespoke, eye-catching resumes that skillfully accentuate each client's strengths.

Her LinkedIn Posts are viewed by 200 million job seekers annually, and she talks about job search challenges, shares client stories and encourages job seekers to know their value and worth.

So, are you ready to elevate your career prospects? Your search starts here! Storeyline Resumes excels in delivering top-tier resume solutions tailored for those eyeing salaries ranging from $100K to $300K and beyond. 

Why opt for Storeyline? Here's our unique edge: 
 
✨ Comprehensive Packages: All-inclusive bundles tailored to your needs, featuring a professionally crafted resume, optimized LinkedIn profile, and persuasive cover letter. 

✨ Personalized Approach: Understand your unique background and career goals through a 45-minute phone interview, customizing application materials for maximum impact. 

✨ Career Growth ($589): Up to 5 years of experience, targeting salaries up to $100K. 

✨ Professional ($689): 8 years of experience, aiming for up to $125K. 

✨ Executive ($789): 10 years of experience, covering $125K to $200K. 

✨ Sr. Exec ($889): 10+ years of experience, targeting $200K to $275K. 

✨ C-Suite ($989): 10+ years of experience, pursuing salaries over $275K. 

✨ NEW Career Coaching: An expert team helping you prepare for interviews, LinkedIn use, salary negotiation, and leadership roles.   
 
Want to learn more? Give us a call/text at 724-832-8845 or book on our website: https://link.writesea.com/widget/bookings/storeyline/consultation  

Questions about how you can step up your career with Storeyline Resumes? Email us: info@storeylineresumes.com.

profile_positions.description:
As the Founder and CEO, Robynn Storey is responsible for setting strategic goals, making major corporate decisions, managing overall operations, and driving the organization's success. 

Storeyline is a 100% remote work setting with a team of 65 USA based professionals and we encourage a strong work/life balance.

Known for our dedication to empowering women and families, we have built a solid, long-term team of HR, Business and Industry Executives who interview our clients to develop world class resumes.  

Storeyline Resumes is a trailblazing resume firm dedicated to propelling our clients careers to new heights. 

Specializing in $100K, $200K, $300K+ roles, we craft distinctive, storytelling based executive resumes that captivate. Our innovative approach, showcasing achievements and personal brand, triples interview opportunities and unlocks superior job offers. Elevate your career journey with Storeyline Resumes. 

Get in touch with us to kickstart the next stage of your career! 

✪ Call/Text for an Initial Chat: 724-832-8845 

✪ Schedule a Call: https://link.writesea.com/widget/bookings/storeyline/consultation

profile_positions.description:
Why YouTube? YouTube is the second largest search engine after Google, with millions of visits and hours of video content. It allows reaching a huge audience of potential clients and it is an essential platform to advertise.

The video format allows to connect with your audience in a unique way, generating more traffic to your website, building Brand awareness and increasing conversions. Did you know that you could select your audience by gender, age, interests and physical location? Or even target only those who have previously visited your site through remarketing programs on YouTube?

profile_positions.description:
Looking to generate inbound enquiries but struggle with the complexities of LinkedIn for B2B lead generation? I love the excitement business owners and sales teams get when they realise the business development potential LinkedIn offers (for free!) 

As a B2B marketer, I work with you to maximise LinkedIn, so that you generate inbound enquiries from people in your target audience that want to speak to you. 

𝗧𝗮𝗶𝗹𝗼𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗟𝗶𝗻𝗸𝗲𝗱𝗜𝗻 𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲𝘀

✅ LinkedIn Profile Writing: ensuring your profile is client focused, presents you as the expert in your niche, is optimised to get you found by your target audience and congruent with the rest of your online profiles

✅ 1 to 1 & Group Coaching: coaching and training focusing on resolving specific challenges and how LinkedIn can work better for you and your business

✅ In-house LinkedIn Training: bespoke in-house training for sales and marketing teams walking you through how to generate those all important inbound enquiries from prospects who actually want to speak to you

✅ Getting Started With LinkedIn: for business owners struggling with where to start on LinkedIn but recognise LinkedIn is a key platform

➤➤ If you’re a sales manager, business owner, coach or consultant and you want to get to grips with this great tool, then please email me at artem@smirnovartem.com or via LinkedIn to arrange a FREE no-obligation 20-min chat about your LinkedIn challenges and what you want to achieve.

Specialities: 
LinkedIn Lead Generation, LinkedIn Training, LinkedIn Profiles, B2B, LinkedIn Coach, LinkedIn Strategy, 1 to 1 LinkedIn Coaching, LinkedIn Sales Training
profile_positions.title: LinkedIn Coaching

profile_positions.description:
✅ Are you looking for a simple, easy to follow approach to using LinkedIn?

✅ One that will give you the confidence and clarity on exactly what you need to do and when on LinkedIn?

✅ A plan of action that will attract more of your ideal clients to you and your business with minimal effort?

As a business owner, coach or consultant, you know LinkedIn is where your audience hangs out. You want to stop faffing around on other social media platforms and really get to grips with LinkedIn as your primary platform for attracting qualified leads. 

LinkedIn Client Attraction Group Coaching is designed for people like you, who are looking for a confident and authentic approach to LinkedIn and . . .

🔥 Practical, easy to follow steps on how to use LinkedIn 

🔥 Your own LinkedIn plan of action, to know what to do and when 

🔥 Conversations with the ‘right’ people, who know what you do and who want to talk to you

𝗚𝗲𝘁 𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝘂𝗻𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗨𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗟𝗶𝗻𝗸𝗲𝗱𝗜𝗻 𝗪𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗳𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲

During this programme, I will coach and guide you on how to use LinkedIn to raise your visibility, to get noticed as an expert, and to generate leads.

We’ll start with the basics, how to set up LinkedIn for success. Then, move onto how to create and post the right content; how to find and get in front of your ideal client; what you need to be saying to start the conversation and the activities to follow that will open the door to opportunities from people who know what you do and want to work with you. 

You will learn . . .

✅	how to use LinkedIn to do the selling for you
✅	how to position yourself as the expert 
✅	how to find and attract your ideal clients 
✅	how to engage and build relationships 

𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗱? 

Please contact me. Either on LinkedIn (where you can message me for free) or email artem@smirnovartem.com for more information.

contact.summary:
“Die with Memories, not Dreams!”

Young, Dynamic with a vision to inspire India, Prafull Billore dons many hats of an Entrepreneur, a Social Media Influencer, an Angel Investor, a Thought Leader and an Impact Creator. His promise is to contribute towards building a nation that is strong, prosperous and Atmanirbhar. 

He is the founder of MBA CHAI WALA INDIA, a popular tea brand with over 100+ outlets across India, which he started with just Rs 8,000. Making a business out of his passion for Chai, MBA CHAI WALA is now a group of entities that include- i-Tea, RiddhiDev, The Dark Beans and Billore Brothers Pvt. Ltd.

The initial hardships of life not only taught him the value of hard work but also the value of giving back to society. His strong presence online and his connection with people offline has been instrumental in bringing about a change in remotest corners of the country. 

His role as a thought leader has helped him connect with the youth and women at top institutions and forums across India. Passionate, courageous, and curious to learn, his motto "Har-Har Start Up, Ghar-Ghar Start Up," reflects his commitment to building a culture of entrepreneurship in India and inspiring people to build an identity for themselves.

profile_positions.description:
Radically Yours is the new age, cross-border connecting platform for startups to find their way to investors, who give strategic guidance, not just financial support. In the same way, we help investors and institutions connect with their targeted investee companies through our network of associations and founders across the globe. We are in the development phase currently to shape up this one of a kind, seamless tech led platform. However, we are accepting requests at connect@radicallyyours.com from startups and companies which are,
1. Looking to raise funds
2. Get mentorship and advice on business plan
3. Seek help from us on content and website development, LinkedIn brand building

In our series, “Radical Simplicity”, we cover trends and issues in the investment funds industry, governance in listed and unlisted companies. Our purpose is to bring out the unheard stories of how companies fail to maximise shareholder value, thereby educate all the investors by capturing the voices of proxy advisors, bankers, and shareholders.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Radhika Bajoria hosts a show named 'Wiping out the norm' which aims at covering stories of women who have wiped out the norm in their field of work. 

This show is a part of Radically Yours' initiative W.I.P.E (Women in Private Equity and Enterprise). We have so far hosted 30+ global women fund managers, investors, and founders. 

Some of our eminent speakers include Vani Kola, Manisha Girotra, Ameera Shah, Naiyya Saggi, Susana Garcia-Robles, Deepali Nangia, and more. 

Our mission goes beyond simply making the business case for women; we are committed to providing unparalleled support, resources, and networking opportunities that fuel women's entrepreneurial journeys. 

Through W.I.P.E, we are building a thriving global network comprising trailblazing women investors and founders.

contact.summary:
John Hammond is a cybersecurity researcher, educator and content creator. As part of the Threat Operations team at Huntress, John spends his days making hackers earn their access and helping tell the story. Previously, as a Department of Defense Cyber Training Academy instructor, he taught the Cyber Threat Emulation course, educating both civilian and military members on offensive Python, PowerShell, other scripting languages and the adversarial mindset. He has developed training material and information security challenges for events such as PicoCTF and competitions at DEFCON US. John speaks at security conferences such as BsidesNoVA, to students at colleges such as the US Naval Academy, and other online events including the SANS Holiday Hack Challenge/KringleCon. He is an online YouTube personality showcasing programming tutorials, CTF video walkthroughs and other cyber security content. John currently holds the following certifications: Security+, CEH, LFS, eJPT, eCPPT, PNPT, PCAP, OSWP, OSCP, OSCE, OSWE, OSEP, and OSED (OSCE(3)).

contact.summary:
As the leader of your organization, unit or department, you have your goals:

• Serve your customers in the best possible way
• Get and keep your people focused and inspired
• Balance performance and organizational health
• Center on the long-term purpose and continuity
…and a whole lot more

Despite having in mind how you will achieve these goals, unforeseen things always happen that keep you from getting where you want your organization to be. As research shows, no less than two-third of formulated strategy plans fail. To beat these odds, you need an actionable and engaging strategy that your employees and stakeholders believe in.

I help companies generate and execute exactly that type of strategy. Once we work together, I support you in your strategy and leadership skills and help you discover, formulate, and execute the right strategy for your organization.  Whether your existing strategy needs to be adjusted, or you need to build it from scratch, there are proven tools and clear steps to follow. Together, we can have a look at where your pain points are and where your moment of opportunity lies.

Based on my combined academic and professional experience, my key strength is turning fragmented ideas and plans into a crisp and coherent strategy that your people will and want to execute.

Let's have a virtual coffee!

↳ jeroenkraaijenbrink.com
↳ strategykickstart.com

projects.description:
In this world of social media stress, fake news and information overload, we easily lose our sensible self. We feel stressed out and do, think, say and feel exponentially strange things. And so we go bananas. 

No More Bananas is a book that helps you free yourself from today’s collective lunacy and reclaim your calm and sensible self. 

The book offers a practical, nine-step journey out of Bananaland with no less than 45 remedies that everyone can apply. Follow this journey, feel better, get done more and become a nicer person.  

#nomorebananas

profile_positions.description:
Strategy.Inc is established by Jeroen Kraaijenbrink, Ph.D., and Timothy Tiryaki, Ph.D .ABD, to create better organizations through strategy design & implementation consulting. 

We research, advocate and pioneer the whole-person, developmental consulting approach,  moving away from the prescriptive and traditional approach in strategy design and implementation.  

Our goal is to assist consultants in developing high-impact skills in strategy design, generation, formulation, and execution, focusing on creating triple-bottom-line value.

Our primary focus is the Certified Strategy and Implementation Consultant program, where we empower like-minded strategy consultants or those that want to move into the space of strategy consulting and implementation support.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder, Mentor and Educator

profile_positions.description:
Based on 10+ years experience as trusted advisor, 15+ years as executive trainer and 20+ years as strategy researcher, I know how to make your strategy work. My methodology follows a set of steps for every organization and client.

☑    Analysis of current state: Through collaborative sessions, we (re-)discover the nature of your organization and determine the strengths and weaknesses that can make or break the strategy.

☑    Synthesis and strategy outline: we develop ideas and choose best scenarios to lay out a plan that will be refined and referred to at later stages.

☑    Development of action plan: After checking with your management team, we translate the strategy into tasks and directions for specific teams and situations to account for any gaps between present and future. 

☑    Monitoring of execution: Finally, I guide you through strategy execution with advice and project mentoring. I make sure a project works and company plans stay relevant based on the specific situation.

Want to know more or get to know me better: send me an email at jeroen@jeroenkraaijenbrink.com or a LinkedIn message.
profile_positions.title: Strategy & Leadership Consultant and Mentor

profile_positions.description:
Aside from wanting to grow you, and your team. I also research and write on topics about strategy planning, execution, and leadership. 

I have 7 published books about strategy:
The One-Hour Strategy: Building a Company of Strategic Thinkers
The Strategy Handbook (2nd ed): The Secret Sauce to Daily Business Success
Strategy Consulting (Cambridge Elements in Business Strategy)
The Strategy Handbook, Part 1: Strategy Generation
The Strategy Handbook, Part 2: Strategy Execution
No More Bananas: How to Keep Your Cool in the Collective Madness
Unlearning Strategy: The 10 Most Persistent Strategy Myths to Forget Immediately

Furthermore, I have written a PhD dissertation, 15+ scientific journal papers, 50+ conference papers, and numerous professional publications in the last 15 years, various of which have received nominations and awards for their excellence and impact. Examples include the Seal of Excellence Certificate by the European Commission, the Journal of Management Scholarly Impact Award, and the Best Empirical Paper Award and the Carolyn Dexter Award for Best International Paper at the Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management.
profile_positions.title: Strategy Researcher and Author

zFull.summary:
Do you need help strengthening your brand and generating leads on LinkedIn™️ ? Networking effectively is essential to convert your audience into loyal customers. Not sure where to start, I'm here to help! Let's work together to optimize your LinkedIn™️ strategy and achieve your goals! 𝗖𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗺𝗲 𝗻𝗼𝘄 ☎️ + 𝟯𝟭 𝟲 𝟱𝟱𝟭𝟭 𝟳𝟮𝟴𝟮

𝗪𝗵𝗼 𝗮𝗺 𝗜?
Born in 🇳🇱, living in 🇪🇸 , in a relationship with Evelina 🇦🇷 and my doodle 🐶 Siena 🇩🇪.
Addicted to international cooking, traveling and Pearl Jam, loving a Gin-Tonic (in that order). 
Used to be a technical skilled footballer, now barely keeping up with the local Veteran team.

𝗕𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘀𝗲
I help individuals, teams, and businesses of all sizes leverage modern Virtual Selling approaches on LinkedIn ™️ to create genuine, authentic, and meaningful relationships with their networks. But how? 🤔
Since 2009, I’ve trained or consulted with 𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝟮𝟱𝟬,𝟬𝟬𝟬 𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗱𝘂𝗮𝗹𝘀 to teach them how to:

👂 Actively listen, identify and discover pain, and respond with empathy 
✔️ Bring a value-first attitude toward their content creation
👋 Engage with the right people at the right time
 
In order to:

👉 Become recognizable thought leaders within their networks or industries
📈 Increase profile engagement, follow requests, messages, and lead generation
🤝 Develop long-lasting relationships that lead to new business and referrals

If you’re considering taking the next step in your LinkedIn™️ and online sales journey, reach out. 

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗖𝗮𝗻 𝘄𝗲 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗧𝗼𝗴𝗲𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿

✅ Just Connecting 
I founded Just Connecting in 2009 to support organisations and professionals with dynamic LinkedIn™️ social selling training to accelerate engagement, growth, and lead generation online. Our team has trained +850 clients in 7 different languages across +40 different countries. 

✅ The TRIBE
An online community dedicated to helping our +160 members leverage social selling to maximize their online presence through ongoing training, community events, masterclasses, etc. Learn from the best in the industry and become a part of the best online ongoing training community today.

✅ Keynote Speaking
I also offer live or virtual keynotes for events and have been rated the Best Keynote Speaker (on LinkedIn™️, Social Selling) at over 80% of the events I've attended. Contact me to deliver insights that 99.9% of other LinkedIn™️ experts can not provide.

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝗠𝗲!
 
📞 Call me +𝟯𝟭 𝟲 𝟱𝟱𝟭𝟭 𝟳𝟮𝟴𝟮 
✉ Send me a message 𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗱𝘃𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗯𝗹𝗼𝗺@𝗷𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴.𝗻𝗹

contact.summary:
As the Founder and CEO of The Management Helpline, I am dedicated to helping companies make fast, easy, and accurate logistics decisions that drive growth and success. With over 16 years of experience leading logistics departments at industry giants like GE, ABB, and L&T, I have developed a deep understanding of the intricacies of logistics and supply chain management.

With an MBA and a B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, I bring a unique combination of business acumen and technical expertise to my work. I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in the industry, and I am passionate about continuous learning and improvement.

At The Management Helpline, we have assembled a team of experts with decades of combined experience in logistics, supply chain management, civil engineering, and EPC project management. We are dedicated to providing our clients with the guidance and support they need to optimize their operations and achieve their goals.

Majorly Offered Services:
❖Logistics Budgeting
❖Logistics Plan 
❖Logistics Method Statement
❖Logistics Directive
❖Logistics Cost Optimization
❖Route Survey & Site Inspection
❖Logistics Contract Framing & Negotiation
❖Logistics / Transporters Management 
❖Logistics Cost Estimation
❖ODC / Heavy Lift Transportation
❖Operation Supervision
❖Logistics Department formation
❖End to End Shipment Management
❖Training & Development Programs

In my free time, I enjoy staying active through outdoor activities like hiking and biking, as well as reading about the latest advancements in logistics and supply chain management. I am also passionate about giving back to the community and regularly volunteer with local nonprofits.

If you're looking to improve your logistics operations and drive growth for your business, The Management Helpline is here to help. 

Contact us today to learn more about how we can support your success.


Connect with me at guptadheer@gmail.com.

profile_positions.description:
As a seasoned Career Coach specialized in Logistics, SCM, and Business Management, I play a pivotal role in guiding professionals to excel within these dynamic sectors. My mission is to assist individuals in achieving their career goals and unlocking their full potential.

Key Responsibilities:

✪Career Assessment: Conduct comprehensive assessments to identify clients' skills, strengths, and aspirations, tailoring career strategies accordingly.

✪Resume and LinkedIn Profile Enhancement: Provide expert guidance in crafting compelling resumes and LinkedIn profiles, highlighting industry-specific skills and experiences.

✪Job Search Strategy: Offer insights into effective job search strategies, including industry-specific channels and networking opportunities.

✪Interview Preparation: Conduct mock interviews and provide constructive feedback to enhance clients' interview skills.

✪Skill Development: Identify skills gaps and recommend relevant training and certifications to bolster qualifications.

✪Career Transition Support: Assist professionals transitioning into Logistics, SCM, or Business Management from other fields, leveraging transferable skills.

✪Entrepreneurship Guidance: Offer strategic advice to aspiring entrepreneurs within these industries, including business planning and strategy development.

✪Salary Negotiation: Coach clients on negotiating competitive compensation packages.

✪Conflict Resolution: Provide guidance on addressing workplace challenges effectively.

✪Professional Development: Advise on continuous learning opportunities, such as conferences, workshops, and seminars.

✪Industry Insights: Share valuable insights into the Logistics, SCM, and Business Management sectors, including key players and potential employers.

✪Personal Branding: Help clients establish a strong personal brand within their chosen field, showcasing their expertise and credibility.

profile_positions.description:
•	Define & deploy sourcing strategy for Transport & Logistic commodity to meet Business targets.
•	Management of Transport commodity includes transport logistics, customs, packing & handling - Creating value to business activities including during Tendering & Project execution by bringing Logistics Service Providers, Freight Forwarders and CHAs expertise.
•	Logistics Budget allocation for project basis and ensure to perform project logistics within budget and time. Optimize, communicate & deploy a competitive Regional Transport strategy in alignment with defined Hydro global strategy
•	Ensure zero Safety violation to Man, Material and Machinery from Loading point, In Transit and Site Unloading.
•	Drive operational efficiencies in the regional Logistics operations to ensure 100% On Time Safe Delivery with respect to material deliveries at project site and Company’s customer invoicing.
•	Taking lead for Freight Negotiations & Finalizations of Work Order & Contract for 3PL, 4PLs, Freight Forwarders, Shipping Lines, Transporters for Inland Movement & Consultants for Excise & Licenses.
•	Taking measure to counter sudden surge in Shipping Line rates and Logistics cost post covid by making effective logistics strategy to minimize the impact.
•	Get sustainable competitive advantages from the LSP panel to maximise opportunities for the business
•	Managing End to End Logistics right from Logistics Order finalization to Shipment execution for EPC projects in India and Globally, specially in India, Malaysia, Philippines, Nepal, & Bhutan.
•	Handling all aspects of Logistics for General Cargo, Dangerous Goods, Heavy Lifts and Over Dimensional Cargo.
•	Managing all phases of Logistics ie. Logistics Execution, Transportation, Project Logistics, Feasibility Survey, Imports & Export.
•	Coordination with Sales Segment Managers to optimize sales, and to meet the targets with respect to Business Plan and Capacity Booking.
profile_positions.title: Lead Logistics Specialist  | Logistics Management | Hydro Power Project Logistics Managment

profile_positions.description:
•	Managing End to End Logistics for projects executing in Oman, Malaysia, India & Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for General Cargo & ODCs, Execution, Warehousing, Transportation, Project Logistics, Feasibility Survey, Imports & Export.
•	Freight Negotiations & Finalizations of Work Order & Contract for Warehousing Agents, 3PL, 4PLs, Freight Forwarders, Shipping Lines, Transporters for Inland Movement & Consultants for Excise & Licenses.
•	Developing & reviewing SOPs on annual basis for procedure for Imports, Exports, Warehousing, Execution of General Cargo, ODCs, Procedures for obtaining Import License.
•	Coordination with Sales Segment Managers to optimize sales, and to meet the targets with respect to Business Plan and Capacity Booking.
•	Prepare & provide weekly as well as monthly M.I.S report for Sales & Management Decision-making for material dispatch status including quarantine and scrap material.
•	Monitoring, Analyzing & Controlling profit leakages such as Demurrages & Detentions.
•	Ensure Storage of Material in warehouse / store as per allocation by the team. Control on Receiving, Dispatch, Data entry process, Documents, etc. 
•	Handling customer complaint related to dispatches.
•	Co-ordination with respective buyer for clearing of vendor/ Client rejection, back to town action and arrange or reverse logistics.
•	Online Negotiation eAuction tools i.e. ARIBA for Freight negotiations with Logistics Service Providers.
•	Developing IT enabled software  Logistics Module linking with Procurement Inspection Material till shipment reaching project site.

zFull.summary:
As the Founder and CEO of The Management Helpline, I am dedicated to helping companies make fast, easy, and accurate logistics decisions that drive growth and success. With over 16 years of experience leading logistics departments at industry giants like GE, ABB, and L&T, I have developed a deep understanding of the intricacies of logistics and supply chain management.

With an MBA and a B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, I bring a unique combination of business acumen and technical expertise to my work. I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in the industry, and I am passionate about continuous learning and improvement.

At The Management Helpline, we have assembled a team of experts with decades of combined experience in logistics, supply chain management, civil engineering, and EPC project management. We are dedicated to providing our clients with the guidance and support they need to optimize their operations and achieve their goals.

Majorly Offered Services:
❖Logistics Budgeting
❖Logistics Plan 
❖Logistics Method Statement
❖Logistics Directive
❖Logistics Cost Optimization
❖Route Survey & Site Inspection

❖Logistics Cost Estimation
❖ODC / Heavy Lift Transportation
❖Operation Supervision
❖Logistics Department formation
❖End to End Shipment Management
❖Training & Development Programs

In my free time, I enjoy staying active through outdoor activities like hiking and biking, as well as reading about the latest advancements in logistics and supply chain management. I am also passionate about giving back to the community and regularly volunteer with local nonprofits.

If you're looking to improve your logistics operations and drive growth for your business, The Management Helpline is here to help. 

Contact us today to learn more about how we can support your success.


Connect with me at guptadheer@gmail.com.

contact.summary:
Believe it or not, the first 10 seconds in a job interview can make or break you. 
Your First Impression is crucial.

The same holds true for your LinkedIn [Name + Personal Photo + Headline]
These three areas affect whether or not someone visits your profile.

This is what I can help you with, 𝐋𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐞𝐝𝐈𝐧 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐟𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧
I can help busy Senior Executives, Business Owners & Managers who might not have the time to work on their LinkedIn profiles get better opportunities. 

⇾ 𝐀𝐁𝐎𝐔𝐓 𝐌𝐄
Lived 1/3 of my life in Kuwait, then the second 1/3 in The USA. Moved back to Jordan in 2007.
In actual life, I am an ambivert, and online, I am an extrovert.

I enjoy sharing and giving.

“Happiness doesn’t result from what we get, but from what we give."
Ben Carson

Also, I'm thrilled to have spoken at two TEDx events, demonstrating my ability to conquer my public speaking phobia.

⇾ 𝐄𝐗𝐏𝐄𝐑𝐓𝐈𝐒𝐄
I served as the government of Jordan's digital media director.
Then proceeded to establish the social media department at Jordan's leading telecommunications company. Since then, I've trained over 10,000 marketing executives and helped over 250 businesses with their digital strategies.
And most recently assisted hundreds in building their LinkedIn profiles.

▪️ Founded JordanBlogs.net in 2006

▪️ Winner of 2015 The Social Media Club Middle East Best Social Media Trainer Award
▪️ Winner of Influencer of the Year in 2016 by TheLivingWell magazine
▪️ In 2019, I published my first book about my quest to establish my personal brand, Shusmo.

I have been speaking and writing about LinkedIn Strategies since the year 2020. Since then, I've assisted a handful of organizations in optimizing their B2B strategy on LinkedIn and guided others in building their personal brands on the platform.

zFull.summary:
Believe it or not, the first 10 seconds in a job interview can make or break you. 
Your First Impression is crucial.

The same holds true for your LinkedIn [Name + Personal Photo + Headline]
These three areas affect whether or not someone visits your profile.

This is what I can help you with, 𝐋𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐞𝐝𝐈𝐧 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐟𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧
I can help busy Senior Executives, Business Owners & Managers who might not have the time to work on their LinkedIn profiles get better opportunities. 

⇾ 𝐀𝐁𝐎𝐔𝐓 𝐌𝐄
Lived 1/3 of my life in Kuwait, then the second 1/3 in The USA. Moved back to Jordan in 2007.
In actual life, I am an ambivert, and online, I am an extrovert.

I enjoy sharing and giving.

“Happiness doesn’t result from what we get, but from what we give."
Ben Carson

Also, I'm thrilled to have spoken at two TEDx events, demonstrating my ability to conquer my public speaking phobia.

⇾ 𝐄𝐗𝐏𝐄𝐑𝐓𝐈𝐒𝐄
I served as the government of Jordan's digital media director.
Then proceeded to establish the social media department at Jordan's leading telecommunications company. Since then, I've trained over 10,000 marketing executives and helped over 250 businesses with their digital strategies.
And most recently assisted hundreds in building their LinkedIn profiles.

▪️ Founded JordanBlogs.net in 2006
▪️ Co-Founded Amman Tech Tuesday monthly tech meetup in 2010
▪️ Established Top100Arabs in 2012 (Had to shut down after the sale of Klout)
▪️ Winner of 2015 The Social Media Club Middle East Best Social Media Trainer Award
▪️ Winner of Influencer of the Year in 2016 by TheLivingWell magazine
▪️ In 2019, I published my first book about my quest to establish my personal brand, Shusmo.

I have been speaking and writing about LinkedIn Strategies since the year 2020. Since then, I've assisted a handful of organizations in optimizing their B2B strategy on LinkedIn and guided others in building their personal brands on the platform.

⇾ 𝐌𝐘 𝐒𝐄𝐑𝐕𝐈𝐂𝐄𝐒
▶️ https://www.linkedin.com/services/page/4a8753309b88859449/
✔ LinkedIn Profile Optimization
✔ LinkedIn coaching
✔ LinkedIn Training for Senior Executives & Sales Teams

⇾ 𝐂𝐎𝐍𝐓𝐀𝐂𝐓 𝐌𝐄

👋 𝐋𝐞𝐭'𝐬 𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐤: 
📧 You can also reach me at khaled@khaledelahmad.com for inquiries or collaborations.

profile_positions.description:
As an award winning CEO turned Business Coach, I founded ChiqueSpeak in an effort to help high-performing individuals and businesses achieve their dreams!  

Juggling demands is common in our professional and personal lives.  Think about a time when these demands flowed smoothly... that’s alignment.  I can help you recapture it!

We have helped thousands of people at Fortune 100 and Fortune 500 companies succeed.

✔ WHY
At the age of 15 I walked out on the life I’d known.  My father drowned when I was a baby.  My mother had severe, untreated mental illness.  Eager to be free of the insecurity, upheaval and unknowing, I created a life, a career and a family.  All with intent, desire and never quitting.

I want to give back and share my wealth of knowledge and experience with others so they may be successful.

✔ WITH ME YOU GET
✧ 25+ years of International Business Skill/Experience
✧ Proven track record of having built multiple successful businesses
✧ 11 Start-ups Globally
✧ Building and Leading a Successful Global Consulting Firm
✧ Deep Knowledge of Corporate and Entrepreneur Business Space
✧ Proven Track Record of High-Value Clients
✧ Proven ability to interact positively with all levels of an organization, both internally and externally.
✧ Strengths in strategic negotiation, planning, partner relationship management, channel development, product launches, market development/expansion, professional services, and team building.

I can help you build any business, anywhere in the world, but this process is ultimately up to YOU.  So how much do you really want your goal?

contact.summary:
I am obsessed with making sense of the non-sensical.

I talk about human potential:

- Productivity, focus, flow
- Philosophy & spirituality
- Finding enjoyment in the mundane

Lifestyle design:

- Workflow optimization
- Working less & earning more
- Habits, routines, and iteration

And one-person businesses:

- Creators, coaches, and solopreneurs
- Content creation systems
- Modern marketing & sales
- Free social media traffic

If you are into any of those, follow along for the ride.

Here's a bit about me:

I’m a brand advisor for 6-7 figure creators and influencers.
I’m the guy they come to when they want to go from starving artist to highly-paid (and highly-praised) internet phenomenon.

I help them systemize their workflow, marketing, and content so they can work for 2 hours a day, charge more, and sell their products & services on autopilot.

I’m good at what I do because I test things on myself so I know what works and what doesn’t.

Because of this, I’ve grown my own personal brand to 150,000+ followers across different platforms, work for 2-4 hours a day on average, and have systems in place that keep the creative income flowing.

(Scratch that, I'm updating this bio 1.5 years later and have grown to 2.6 million followers with the strategies I have been writing about for that time).

It feels like I’m boasting... but I guess that’s a hit I’m willing to take to ease your worries of trusting some random dude with your time and attention.

I will, however, never apologize for aiming to be as transparent as humanely possible.

Here is some of my work:

My articles: https://thedankoe.com/blog
The Koe Letter: https://links.thedankoe.com/#letter
My website: https://thedankoe.com

If you are looking for more, you can find me on all socials @thedankoe

profile_positions.description:
Nobody cares about you.

This is the first, and the most important marketing lesson you should learn.

People only care about WHAT'S IN IT FOR THEM.

Regardless of your Industry, level of expertise, or company size - until people believe you can actually SOLVE their problems, you're just a number.

One more SaaS business. One more freelancer. Whatever.

Not an expert they'd ask for advice, listen to what you have to say, or someone they'd BUY FROM.

And that's costing you money. Big time.

Despite of all of your marketing efforts, you're still stuck in the same place - 

struggling with sales, having no idea which words to say to hook your Target Audience, or how to communicate all the benefits your business offers.

Your Brand Authority is WEAK.

The thing is — when you manage to build your Brand Authority, not only do you attract clients, but you attract the RIGHT ones, get paid what you deserve, and do things AS YOU BELIEVE they should be done.

You become the DEFAULT option for your Target Audience.

The question is - how to get there?

Leave it to us.


Here's what we'll do for you:

▪️AUTHORITY WRITING (We do all the heavy lifting for you by writing persuasive LinkedIn Profiles, Sales Pages, and Landing Pages. Ideal for funded startups & SMBs that don’t have a marketing team.)

▪️LINKEDIN AUTHORITY COACHING (Teaching you the same strategy that got me from 700 to 12k followers in 12 months, while averaging 5 Business Inquiries PER DAY, step-by-step. Ideal for up-and-coming online creators.)

▪️BRAND AUTHORITY ACCELERATOR (The Brand Kit for building Authority, i.e. Templates, Cheatsheets & Frameworks for communicating your Brand's Value on all channels. Ideal for marketing teams & up-and-coming online creators.)


Are you ready to master your messaging, take control of your Brand, and become the FIRST option in your Target Audience's mind?

👉🏼 Shoot me a DM, or head over to my Featured section & check out our Offer.

See you on the other side.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Do you have that smart friend who’s always challenging your work?
 
I have one, and sometimes I want to slap him in the face even when he’s praising what I do.
 
- Dina, you basically don’t sell.
- What do you mean? I do sales calls, right?
-  Right, but when you’re on a sales call, there’s no pitching, negotiation, closing, call structure — any of this regular stuff. There’s just casual chatting. Sales don’t usually go that smooth.

- I do get clients, don’t I?
- You sure do. The thing is, you convert them through your copy & content before they even jump on a call with you. The call is just a formality. (Which is awesome by the way.)
- Aha. Thanks.
- Aaand… there’s one more thing that makes your sales easy.
- What?

- You have managed to build your Brand Authority.
- Brand Authority?
- Think of Apple — people buy iPhones and MacBooks without even looking at the features, comparing it with other brands, haggling over the price. That’s Brand Authority.
- True.
- You basically went from commodity to Authority in LESS THAN A YEAR. Have you ever thought about doing it for your clients?
 

This last one was a lightbulb moment for me.
 
Now, I’ve always wanted to be a Copywriter.
 
But I realised that all my clients need more than great copy.
 

Let’s face it — all businesses want to get people to:
 
▪️Read what they write,

▪️Listen to what they say,

▪️Understand what they bring to the table,

▪️Trust their advice, and

▪️FEEL CONFIDENT that they can solve their problems.
 

Yet, most don’t have the NECESSARY TOOLS to deliver the RIGHT MESSAGE across the whole Marketing Funnel.
  
That’s how Authority Marketing was born.
profile_positions.title: Direct Response Copywriter

profile_positions.description:
If you’ve read this far, you are probably wondering what my current business has to do with Event Management.

See, being an organisational freak is the other part of me.

And when I say freak, I mean FREAK.

Every day I eat at the exact same time, I'd never forget what we've agreed on (even if it's a meeting on 17th of March 2057 at 3 pm), and my calendar says when I need to wash my hair.

...Yeah, I know.

But you must admit it's not a bad idea to turn that madness (read skill) into a business.

So while I was still miserable at the Faculty of Economics & Business, I started my own company organising global events for the USA and UK-based clients.

Often called a “human calendar” by my clients, I really enjoyed my job.

However, I've been in love with writing since I was a kid.

One day I decided to focus all my efforts on mastering the art and science of Copywriting. 

So I did.

And I won’t lie – turning my passion into a business felt incredibly good.

I felt like I finally came back to my true self. 


So, how does being a "human calendar" make me a better Business Owner that I am today? 

1. I stick to my words. Regardless of who you are.

2. I respect what we've agreed on. Even when circumstances change.

3. I do what I say. And I do it well.

projects.description:
Master Thesis, Supervisor: Dr Kjell Salvanes (Department of Economics, NHH)

Research Question: How did income distribution and inequality look like in Norway in 1930?

Data used: Municipality level pre-tax income data from Municipality Tax registries from Norway Census 1930 published by Archives, Stats Norway Kongsberg

Methodology: Non-parametric models such as histogram and kernel density estimation for analysing income distribution, Gini coefficient and top income shares for calculating income inequality

Conclusion: Urban areas in Norway were richer and more equal than rural areas in 1930, and although men were on an average richer than women, both men and women had similar levels of inequality. The Gini coefficient of Norway in 1930 was 0.522, much more than Norway’s Gini coefficient in 2013 that stood at 0.252.

contributors.headline: Founding partner at Tremis Capital

projects.title: Income Distribution and Income Inequality in Norway in 1930

projects.description:
Course: Labour Economics

Research Question: How did income inequality change in the United States and Norway over the 20th century and what were the reasons behind it?

Data used: Top income shares of United States and Norway from World Wealth and Income Database (wid.world) 

Methodology: Comparison of income shares of top 1%, top 5%, top 10%, P 90-95 and P 95-99 in the period between 1918 and 2013 for the United States and between  1875 and 2011 for Norway

Conclusion: Both United States and Norway had the same level of inequality in 1945. Inequality decreased in both the countries from 1945 till the early 1970s. This decline continued in Norway till the early 1990s while inequality started increasing in the United States from 1970s. Inequality started increasing in the United States because of increase in top wage shares while it started increasing in Norway because of major financial markets and tax reforms.

contributors.headline: Founding partner at Tremis Capital

projects.title: Income inequality in Norway and United States

projects.description:
Course: Petroleum Economics

Research question: To discuss the impact of extraction of gas from the Barents Sea on Norwegian State and public at large, oil companies and environment.
 
Methodology: Financial feasibility of exploring and extracting the gas considering current and future gas prices, current policy and tax regime and physical constraints such as accessibility, infrastructure, and huge investments

Conclusion: Progressive tax system encourages companies to invest since the risk is shared by the Norwegian state but can lead to misallocation of capital in cases when high investment costs are involved

contributors.headline: Founding partner at Tremis Capital

projects.title: Challenges in profitable and safe extraction of gas from Norwegian Barents Sea

projects.description:
Course: Empirical Methods and Applications in Macroeconomics and Finance

Research Question: To discuss intelligence correlations in detail and to provide guidelines on how to formulate educational policies

Data used: Danish Longitudinal Survey of Youth (DLSY) and the Danish Longitudinal Survey of Youth - Children (DLSY-C), two surveys that contain the scores of an intelligence test for both the parents and the children.

Methodology:  OLS and random effects models

Conclusion: Substantial intergenerational and sibling correlations exist, and shared environmental factors explain 13.7 % of the variance of children's IQ scores

contributors.headline: Founding partner at Tremis Capital

projects.title: Intergenerational correlations in intelligence between parents and children and intragenerational correlations in intelligence between siblings

projects.description:
Course: Empirical Analysis of Energy Markets

Research Question: How does change in oil prices affect the profitability of automobile and transport sectors in Europe, the USA and Japan?

Data used:  Automobile and transport indices for Europe, USA, and Japan and Brent crude oil prices between 2004 and 2014

Methodology:  Cointegration test, Granger-causality test and sensitivity analysis using OLS 

Conclusion: Change in oil prices explain a high percentage of return in the automobile sector (90 % for Europe,  65 % for the USA  and 77 % for Japan) and relatively lower proportion of return in the transport sector (36 % for Europe, 71 % for the USA and 33 % for Japan).

contributors.headline: Founding partner at Tremis Capital
Head Of Business Development at Diófa Asset Management

projects.title: The effect of change in energy prices on return of automobile and transport industries

contact.summary:
As far as I remember, I have always been a creative person.  

In my childhood, I was fascinated with colors. I spent most of my time painting, sketching, and experimenting with ideas. 

In college, I wrote poetry, random thoughts in my diary, and script for drama. 

So, in 2014, when I graduated from Business School, I knew that I wanted something more than just a job. It had to be interesting, exciting and should give more to learn and grow.  

I started my career in management research and worked as a research associate at ICFAI university for 2 years. 

I Developed 27 Business Case studies on Marketing & Strategy, published in ICFAI Journal & The Case Centre, London. I also won the Oikos International Case Study competition in Switzerland, in 2015 and was mentioned in The Hindu. 

Some of the case studies authored by me are now taught in leading B Schools around the globe. 

I started my journey in digital marketing when I got an offer from Prowess Publishing, a book publishing company in Hyderabad, to build their online brand. 

For the next 3 years, I led the marketing team at Prowess to build a brand that appealed to their customers, creating social media presence and generated leads from paid online marketing campaigns. 

Prowess went from publishing 20 books a month to 1000+ books a month within 2 years. 

I moved on with rich experience and worked with numerous companies in Real Estate, IT Services, and Cybersecurity and replicated the same success.  

I worked as a digital marketing consultant for small and medium companies to help them build their brand, create social media presence, and connect with potential customers with paid advertising.

Currently, I work as a Digital Marketing Consultant & Trainer, LinkedIn Coach & a Personal Branding Strategist to help people start a career in digital marketing, build their LinkedIn Profile, improve Resume, and find a job/clients using LinkedIn. 

Follow me to learn about digital marketing, blogging, social media marketing, LinkedIn, and content marketing. 

If you want to get in touch don't hesitate to inbox me or shoot a mail. 

My email id: surojit111@gmail.com

Let's connect.

People often ask how I became CEO of ELIXR, a Multi-National Company, at such a young age. 

So, who am I?

I’m Catalina Valentino, a young passionate entrepreneur. 🔥 

✓ At 11 I achieved my first GCSE (A*).
✓ At 16 I started a BA in Business Management.
✓ At 19 I was leading teams & started my MSc.

✓ At 19 I also started my first 6-figure company. 
✓ At 20 I won Young Entrepreneur of The Year.
✓ At 21 I made the move into Tech & Sustainability.


🏆 Young Entrepreneur of the Year 2022 & Women of the Future 2023.

✘ Board Advisor to Una Terra Impact Fund ($200M)

✘ Advisor to The British Youth Council.
✘ Investor to Waxelene 

📝 BA | MSc | PhD (TBC)

📚 NEARLY an Author - I have 3 Co-Authored books launching over the next 6 months!

Send a DM! 📧

treasury_media.description: The World Business Angels Investment Forum (WBAF) is an international organisation aiming to ease access to finance for businesses from start up to scale up, with the ultimate goal of generating more jobs and more social justice worldwide. It is committed to collaborating globally to empower world economic development by creating innovative financial instruments for innovators, startups, and SMEs. The Forum interacts with leaders in all areas of society, first and foremost in business and political spheres, to help assess needs and establish goals, bearing in mind that the public interest is of paramount importance. We engage a wide range of institutions, both public and private, local and international, commercial and academic to help shape the global agenda.

profile_positions.description:
An affiliated partner of the G20 - Global Partnership for Financial Inclusion (GPFI) chaired by Her Majesty Queen Maxima of the Netherlands. 

The World Business Angels Investment Forum (WBAF) is an international organisation aiming to ease access to finance for businesses from start up to scale up to exit, with the ultimate goal of generating more jobs and more social justice worldwide. 

It is committed to collaborating globally to empower world economic development by creating innovative financial instruments for innovators, startups, and SMEs.

The Forum interacts with leaders in all areas of society, first and foremost in business and political spheres, to help assess needs and establish goals, bearing in mind that the public interest is of paramount importance. 

We engage a wide range of institutions, both public and private, local and international, commercial and academic to help shape the global agenda.

We hold that, with the participation of individuals and institutions from multiple sectors and from all parts of society, real progress can be achieved.

www.wbaforum.org

Almost all business problems are people problems. Because people without a purpose have no centralised reason driving them to perform. 
 
After exiting my last business, I now coach leaders on how to build purpose-led businesses that perform.

profile_positions.description:
BASE - Behaviours, Attitude, Skills, Experience. 
www.basemindset.com

We drive and refocus you and your business to master these 4 components to their maximum effect

We work with people who want to harness their purpose to deliver best performance. 

The coaching, NED and advisory services we provide to you includes a powerful and comprehensive process for ongoing personal development, transformation, and achievement, designed jointly with the client and may also, in agreement with the client, address specific personal issues if required. 

We are strong advocates that what we do outside of work, who we hang around with, the content we absorb and other elements we indulge on or don’t indulge in, impact our ability to execute what we want in our career AND our life. 

Time management and life balance elements like the below are key to master, and the aim is to work smarter not harder, and achieve exceptional outcomes in all 6 areas. 

Our Hexagon motif is related to the meaning of 6, with the Hexagon being the strongest shape in the universe. 

The meaning of 6 wants you to achieve harmony and balance, not just in work, but in family, home, domesticity and parenthood, and that everything will follow once you have a peaceful and stable life.  

🟥Business and Career
🟧Personal Development
🟨Health and Fitness
🟩Purpose
🟦Finance & Wealth
🟪Relationships

contact.title: Ventures Lead - India
contact.titleDescription:
Leading venture investing for Verlinvest in India (now called V3 Ventures). Verlinvest is a 20+ year old consumer sector focussed investor that has invested iconic brands like Vitamin Water, Vita Coco, Pop Chips, Oatly & Lazada. 

In India, the fund has invested in brands like Sula, Veeba, Epigamia, Wakefit, Purplle, Byjus and Heads up For Tails. 

Ventures (now called V3 Ventures) is a new strategy we participate in the early stages of growth of consumer brands (D2C), e-commerce platforms, enablers to e commerce and consumer internet opportunities. Our strategy will largely focus on pre series A and Series A rounds with a ticket size of USD 1-5m. 

Through this strategy we have already invested in Kuku FM and Eka.care in India.

contact.summary:
Hi, I’m Arjun, and I’m a D2C founder & investor. I built Dr. Vaidya’s to India’s largest Ayurveda brand online and took it to an acquisition. I now lead venture investing for Verlinvest through a new fund called V3 Ventures. 

I'm also an active angel investor and mentor to brands in India’s startup ecosystem. If you’re an early-stage founder DM me - I'm happy to chat!

Here's my story:

‘Vaidya’ my last name means Ayurvedic doctor and I come from 150 years of Ayurveda legacy. I grew up with asthma and after 14 years of treatment, I was cured. More than just being a family legacy, I became a believer in the potential of the science and so I promised him I’d take forward this legacy.

In 2009, I went to Brown University for my undergrad. I witnessed the natural and organic products revolution there. I also saw yoga become a multibillion-dollar industry with a repackaged identity for modern consumers. This made me think about the opportunity we had with Ayurveda…

In 2013, I moved back to India and joined a consumer sector focused growth private equity fund called L Catterton. Here, I spent time understanding and investing in the Indian consumer story. I was also fortunate to see the advent of e-commerce in India closely.

In this time, my grandfather passed and so, I decided to action the promise I had made him. 

In October 2016, I quit my job to take on my family’s Ayurveda legacy. Dr. Vaidya’s repackaged the ancient Indian science of Ayurveda for modern consumers and emerged as India’s largest Ayurveda brand online. In 4 years, we successfully reached 2m+ consumers across 16,500+ pin codes in India and launched 80+ products and clocked 5,000+ orders per day!

I was the first Ayurvedic Entrepreneur to be featured in the Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia List for and Business World 40 Under 40 List! We also won Youth SMB of the Year from Amazon and the Retail Startup Award from the Retailers Association of India. In June 2019, we partnered with the USD 4b RP Sanjiv Goenka Group and led the business to an acquisition by the group – making it one of India’s first successful D2C exits. 

Post the exit, I have become an active early stage investor (through V3 Ventures and as an angel). 
 
Outside work, I’m a World Economic Forum Global Shaper and a part Brown University’s Young Alumni Advisory Council. I also run a podcast called Direct to a Billion Consumers on navigating India’s complex and exciting FMCG ecosystem. Check it out here: https://campsite.bio/d2bc

profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Leading venture investing for Verlinvest in India (now called V3 Ventures). Verlinvest is a 20+ year old consumer sector focussed investor that has invested iconic brands like Vitamin Water, Vita Coco, Pop Chips, Oatly & Lazada. 

In India, the fund has invested in brands like Sula, Veeba, Epigamia, Wakefit, Purplle, Byjus and Heads up For Tails. 

Ventures (now called V3 Ventures) is a new strategy we participate in the early stages of growth of consumer brands (D2C), e-commerce platforms, enablers to e commerce and consumer internet opportunities. Our strategy will largely focus on pre series A and Series A rounds with a ticket size of USD 1-5m. 

Through this strategy we have already invested in Kuku FM and Eka.care in India.
profile_positions.title: Ventures Lead - India

profile_positions.description:
Dr. Vaidya’s is a New Age Ayurvedic products company, which endeavours to bring our rich, traditional Indian science of Ayurveda to today’s modern consumer- both in India and Worldwide. Founded by the Vaidya family, who has over 150 years of Ayurvedic heritage, our formulations have been passed from generation to generation, treating thousands in the process. 

Today, the company owns 100+ FDA approved, proprietary formulations for Ayurvedic medicine all manufactured at our ISO 9001:2015 approved, GMP certified, US FDA registered, factory in Silvassa (180 km from Mumbai). 

As the founder and CEO, I scaled the brand from 0-5,000 orders a day. Dr. Vaidya's reached 2m transacting customers across 16,5000 pin codes and launched 80+ products. The brand was also featured in the Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia List and Business World 40 U 40 list and voted the Amazon Youth SMB of the Year. 

In June 2019, RP Sanjiv Goenka Group invested in the series A of the company. As of March 2021, the group has acquired the entire business through RPSG Ventures making it one of India's first D2C exits.
profile_positions.title: CEO and 6th Generation Vaidya

🏆 I have worked with leading finance brands like PLANERGY, PHOCAS, CLEARTAX, and AVALARA.

OK, now since I have grabbed your attention with a little bit of social proof, let's address the PROBELM:

> Financial brands sound so BORING AND DULL that instead of grabbing their audience's attention, they end up frustrating the audience.

> At the same time, founders don't care about writing on LinkedIn because they have got too much on their plate - keeping LinkedIn untreated in 2023 is like leaving a pot of gold on road 😑

Result? Brands and founders fail to:

❌ Build thought-leadership in their domain 
❌ Inform and educate their audience

❌ Build a pool of early adopters and brand evangelists

That’s where I come in with my Done-For-You Content Writing, Copywriting, and Ghostwriting Services. I offer:

profile_positions.description:
As a finance founder, you might not have enough time to create content on LinkedIn. Or you might not know how to translate your raw thoughts or opinions into structured LinkedIn posts. 

Either way, I ghostwrite LinkedIn posts for you by matching the content for your unique personality and tone.

Benefits:

💎 build thought leadership and credibility
💎 grab the target audience's attention 
💎 connect with potential investors
💎 hire exciting talent
💎 get invitations to podcasts, seminars, events, etc.
💎 build a pool of vendors, contractors, freelancers, etc.

[1] I do the heavy lifting by researching, writing, editing, and publishing the content on your behalf - time problem solved! 

[2] I interview you to get content ideas so that your personality is reflected in your posts - personality issues solved!

[3] I repurpose the Instagram content for LinkedIn by writing killer hooks and adding a powerful CTA - repurposing issues solved!

Most importantly, I spend enough time understanding your personality and adapting to your tone and voice so that your content reflects YOU, not ME.

contact.summary:
Feeling stuck in your business despite your hard work? 

You're not alone and I'm here to help you reignite your entrepreneurial spirit and guide you and your business towards your desired success.

Over the past 20 years, I've assisted many entrepreneurs and leaders, helping them overcome obstacles, build effective teams, and drive immense growth. I help you align your passion with your purpose, then formulate and help you execute the plans for achieving the wealth and business legacy you're after.

At Exit Your Way, we utilize a powerful, unique system of strategy, focus, and execution that produces transformative outcomes. Our goal is straightforward - to improve business results, relationships, and your overall life.

Choosing to work with me means:

⚡️ Boosting leadership, communication, and teamwork.
⚡️ Achieving quick wins and long-term business growth.
⚡️ Reducing stress and burnout.
⚡️ Amplifying business success.
⚡️ Increasing focus on goal achievement.
⚡️ Enhancing business decision-making.

Ready to make revolutionary changes in your business but unsure of where to start? 

Maybe you're wondering why some people are extraordinarily successful while you're still searching for the secret. Or you're fed up with struggling and not reaching your potential. 

If this speaks to you, it's time to shift gears.

I've walked this path and guided many entrepreneurs like you towards success. I've generated hundreds of millions in value by helping businesses streamline and dominate their markets executing the right strategies.

Besides professional achievements, I take pride in my personal journey. Raised on a South Dakota farm, I've been with my wife for over 20 years, raised two kids, and embraced roles as a business leader, athlete, coach, mentor, and family man. I understand the importance of intentional focus in personal and professional life.

Change Your Course!

Don't let your diligence go unrewarded. You've invested your heart and soul into your business. Let's work together to forge a new path, ensuring your business thrives as you intended. Experience the freedom and financial rewards that come with running a prosperous business.

profile_positions.description:
The average success rate for selling a business is about 25%. The business value or aspects of the business will usually prevent the sale of the business.  

This is why the decision to sell a business often leads to the owner realizing the business won’t sell.  
These owners are faced with making significant lifestyle changes.

Traditional investment bankers and business brokers are focused on selling a business “as is” for “market value”.  These methods force owners to accept the "as-is" price and terms of the sale.  

Exit Your Way® helps business owners plan, prepare, and complete the sale of their business to exit with 2x+ more $$$$ and a 90%+ success rate.  It is not easy, but when owners successfully sell a business on their terms, it is worth it.

Exit Your Way® applies their approach refined through years of building and selling client businesses to grow, prepare, and successfully sell privately held businesses.   

The Exit Your Way® step-by-step approach helps clients plan and execute the changes needed that allow business owners to produce the desired results when selling their businesses.  

If you want to learn more about how Exit Your Way® might help you improve your results selling a business, contact us:

info@exityourway.com
833-BIZ-EXIT (249-3948)
www.ExitYourWay.com

contact.summary:
LEARN TOP LINKEDIN AND SOCIAL SELLING STRATEGIES ►   

The buyer's journey has changed. Buyers are now researchers, explorers, self-educators, and collaborative decision-makers - and it's significantly impacting the traditional sales process. 

The Know, Like, and Trust mantra is now predicated with Attract, Teach, and Engage. If you are not breaking through the noise, gaining access to stakeholders, and positioning yourself as the thought leader and subject matter expert, your competition will.

► There is a 5 Step Framework for Mastering LinkedIn for Social Selling:

➊  Convert your LinkedIn profile from a resume to a resource. By providing insights and value rather than your mission, passion, and years in business, you position yourself as the subject matter expert and thought leader - not simply a salesperson!

➋ Learn what really matters to your buyers through strategic social listening. Identify industry trends, company priorities and personal objectives, making your outreach relevant and your activities effective.
 
➌ Lead your buyers to your solutions by writing and sharing content that gets them thinking differently about their current situation and excited to talk with you. 

➍ Take inventory of your existing connections to identify the clients, prospects, and referral partners that you’ve been ignoring. Engaging with your targeted network with personal and relevant outreach is an ideal way to start more meaningful conversations.

➎ Receive targeted introductions from your clients and centers of influence. Before a meeting, bring a list of whom they are connected to that you want to meet and invite them to do the same. 

This 5 Step framework is essential for social selling success. And while being well trained is important, it only matters if it's driving revenue.

It is vital that you have a complete playbook and message templates to leverage LinkedIn productively throughout the entire sales process, including research, lead generation, appointment setting, nurturing, creating a consensus, running insights calls, and referrals. 

And it is essential to reinforce the right activities at the right time to maximize adoption and get measurable results.

If you are exploring ways to leverage LinkedIn or Sales Navigator, let’s chat. Whether or not we decide to work together, I am confident that our call will be full of insights and actionable steps that can help you grow your business. 

Here's a link to my calendar ScheduleaCallwithBrynne.com please pick a time that works best for you.

215.499.0499 |  brynne.tillman@socialsaleslink.com
contact.title: CEO | LinkedIn Author | LinkedIn Sales Trainer | Sales Navigator Trainer  ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐
contact.companyLocation: West Orange, New Jersey, United States
contact.titleDescription:
I started my sales career in 1990, right out of college. As a bored inbound order-taker for a Fortune 1000 company, I began to ask my callers questions about their transactions and why they were purchasing specific products. I learned a lot about our clients' needs and how they used our solutions. I began to offer more appropriate products for their specific needs, that in many cases had a huge impact on their businesses. By the time I was 24 I was training an entire call center on how to evolve from order takers to a sales solutions team. 

I was soon promoted to the field when I fell in love with sales. I loved interacting with my prospects and clients and I got great joy from helping them succeed. What I didn't love was the cold calling. 

I recall sitting across from a client, staring at his overflowing Rolodex, thinking if I could get my hands on it for 20 minutes I could identify who he knew that I wanted to meet, ask for introductions and never have to make another cold call. But in 1992 it wasn't politically correct to say "Mr. client, can I thumb through your address book". 

Three decades later, that is what we have with LinkedIn. The ability to search and filter our network's connections, identify who they know that we want a conversation with, and leverage our relationships for introductions, referrals, and permission to name-drop.

And that is just the tip of the iceberg!

There is no better, more effective tool for your sales efforts than Linkedin, especially in today's remote working environment. And, my team and I are excited to guide you to Master LinkedIn for Social Selling to grow your business. (Both the free version and Sales Navigator)

If you’re exploring ways to fill your pipeline with warm leads, position yourself as a thought leader, attract buyers, and start more sales conversations, let's chat. I will share insights and actionable steps that you can implement, even if we decide not to work together.

projects.title: 33 Social Selling Tips from Leading Social Selling Leaders

projects.description:
Client: 
Healthcare Insurance Company in the Greater Philadelphia Area

Driver: 
Due to the shift in the healthcare environment and the change in broker compensation, it was critical for our client to sign on a few new clients to not just maintain their revenue but grow.

Challenge: 
Client had difficulty identifying the influencers and decision makers in their target market (Fortune 1000 companies). Even when they did find the right people, getting past the gatekeeper was nearly impossible due to the endless call volume and the enormous competition in the industry.

Solution: 
We identified all the possible titles of the influencers and decision makers in the human resource departments, created saved searches with the accurate criteria including company size, location, and common connections. Once we identified key prospects we created messaging templates and a social selling plan to engage and connect. We then converted new connections to initial phone calls with strategic follow-up.

Result: 
Over a 6-month period, our clients had 27 new meaningful, scheduled conversations with decision makers that converted to 8 face-to-face appointments and 3 new clients.

profile_positions.description:
I started my sales career in 1990, right out of college. As a bored inbound order-taker for a Fortune 1000 company, I began to ask my callers questions about their transactions and why they were purchasing specific products. I learned a lot about our clients' needs and how they used our solutions. I began to offer more appropriate products for their specific needs, that in many cases had a huge impact on their businesses. By the time I was 24 I was training an entire call center on how to evolve from order takers to a sales solutions team. 

I was soon promoted to the field when I fell in love with sales. I loved interacting with my prospects and clients and I got great joy from helping them succeed. What I didn't love was the cold calling. 

I recall sitting across from a client, staring at his overflowing Rolodex, thinking if I could get my hands on it for 20 minutes I could identify who he knew that I wanted to meet, ask for introductions and never have to make another cold call. But in 1992 it wasn't politically correct to say "Mr. client, can I thumb through your address book". 

Three decades later, that is what we have with LinkedIn. The ability to search and filter our network's connections, identify who they know that we want a conversation with, and leverage our relationships for introductions, referrals, and permission to name-drop.

And that is just the tip of the iceberg!

There is no better, more effective tool for your sales efforts than Linkedin, especially in today's remote working environment. And, my team and I are excited to guide you to Master LinkedIn for Social Selling to grow your business. (Both the free version and Sales Navigator)

If you’re exploring ways to fill your pipeline with warm leads, position yourself as a thought leader, attract buyers, and start more sales conversations, let's chat. I will share insights and actionable steps that you can implement, even if we decide not to work together.

profile_positions.title: The Entrepreneur's LinkedIn and Social Selling Package

profile_positions.description:
Social Selling is the art of leveraging online platforms and tools to attract, teach and engage targeted buyers and get them excited to take your call.

We can help you get there: faster and more effectively with the 8 steps to rolling out an effective LinkedIn and Social Selling program for Sales Teams. Whether the workshop are led onsite or it is live/virtual - instructor led online, the Social Sales team will guide everyone responsible for business development to schedule more calls with targeted buyers. 

Our process is:
➊ Define the Desired Outcome & Establish Goals & KPI’s 
➋ Buyer Identification & Mapping
➌ Choose Digital Productivity Tools
➍ Sales Content Creation, Curation & Distribution
➎ Develop Customized Playbook Including Daily Activities & Templates 
➏ Buyer-Centric Profile Development
➐ LinkedIn & Social Selling Training
➑ Measure Results and Coach for Improvement

► Best practices for developing your program:

✓ Always keep your goal in mind when developing and executing your program. In most cases, the goal of a social selling is to get more phone calls with qualified buyers.

✓ Whether you are creating curiosity, concern or consensus, make sure your messaging is about attracting, teaching and engaging your buyers not about selling them on your products and services.

✓ Get buy-in from the top down. A digital sales program needs to be embraced by all the influencers and stakeholders in order to become part of the embedded sales and marketing culture and methodology.

► If your process is basically random acts of social, and you aren't getting the results that you expect, I invite you to have a conversation. Whether or not we decide to work together, I am confident our call will be full of insights and actionable tactics that you can implement right away.

Here's link to my schedule, please pick a time that works best. http:// ScheduleaCallwithBrynne.com.

profile_positions.title: Author, The LinkedIn Sales Playbook: A Tactical Guide to Social Selling

profile_positions.description:
Recent studies have shown that a majority of buyers are "significantly influenced" by what they find on social networks. It's not a mystery, then, that utilizing social media as part of the sales process has become a trait of top-selling salespeople, 90% of whom are leveraging social selling according to LinkedIn. These same salespeople who leverage social selling also tend to hit their quotas more often and outperform their peers.

Is your sales team engaging the buyer in social media, or is your competitor?
Bringing together leaders and influencers who have trained dozens of companies from a variety of industries internationally in the new world of social selling, this program goes beyond simple "I already knew that" LinkedIn training and provides participants a global perspective on leveraging social media that is applicable to both B2B and B2C salespeople.

The objective of this innovative program is to train salespeople to not only master the tactical functionality that is possible with social media in order to help engage with the digital buyer at every stage of the sales cycle, but also to build internal leaders and change agents who will truly impact an organization's sales and internal digital literacy after taking the program.

More specifically, this course will cover professional branding, aligning one's own brand with that of the corporation, social selling across multiple social networks (including LinkedIn), the importance of getting people on board and minimizing internal resistance, breaking down internal barriers to social selling, better aligning social selling efforts with marketing and employee advocacy programs, and calculating the ROI of social selling efforts.

http://www.business.rutgers.edu/executive-education/programs/social-selling-digital-world
profile_positions.title: Faculty Member

profile_positions.description:
WEEK 1 – Optimizing the LinkedIn profile, from a resume to a resource. From search engine optimization to branding you as the vendor of choice, this program will help you position your profile to attract, teach, and engage your buyers.

WEEK 2 – Office Hours. Bring your questions, share your profiles and get some help on updating your professional brand

WEEK 3 –Thought leadership: creating, curating, and engaging on content is foundational to attracting your targeted audience and starting conversations on LinkedIn. During this week we will cover the essentials to sharing insights and being of value to your audience in a way that gets their attention and starts conversations.

WEEK 4 – Nurture New and Existing Connections – During this program, participants will learn how to search their current connections to identify who they want to engage, learn ways to help them build and deepen their relationships and welcome new connections into their network. 

WEEK 5 – Warm Market Prospecting – Leveraging existing connections to gain access to targeted stakeholders is one of the most powerful tools LinkedIn offers. Through targeted searches, participants will learn how to find out who in your network can make introductions to ideal clients and referral partners and proven outreach strategies to start meaningful conversations.

WEEK 6 – Office Hours. Brynne will answer your networking prospecting questions, help you find and engage your targeted buyers and ensure that you are leveraging LinkedIn to grow your business.

profile_positions.description:
