zFull.summary:
LEARN TOP LINKEDIN AND SOCIAL SELLING STRATEGIES ►   

The buyer's journey has changed. Buyers are now researchers, explorers, self-educators, and collaborative decision-makers - and it's significantly impacting the traditional sales process. 

The Know, Like, and Trust mantra is now predicated with Attract, Teach, and Engage. If you are not breaking through the noise, gaining access to stakeholders, and positioning yourself as the thought leader and subject matter expert, your competition will.

► There is a 5 Step Framework for Mastering LinkedIn for Social Selling:

➊  Convert your LinkedIn profile from a resume to a resource. By providing insights and value rather than your mission, passion, and years in business, you position yourself as the subject matter expert and thought leader - not simply a salesperson!

➋ Learn what really matters to your buyers through strategic social listening. Identify industry trends, company priorities and personal objectives, making your outreach relevant and your activities effective.
 
➌ Lead your buyers to your solutions by writing and sharing content that gets them thinking differently about their current situation and excited to talk with you. 

➍ Take inventory of your existing connections to identify the clients, prospects, and referral partners that you’ve been ignoring. Engaging with your targeted network with personal and relevant outreach is an ideal way to start more meaningful conversations.

➎ Receive targeted introductions from your clients and centers of influence. Before a meeting, bring a list of whom they are connected to that you want to meet and invite them to do the same. 

This 5 Step framework is essential for social selling success. And while being well trained is important, it only matters if it's driving revenue.

It is vital that you have a complete playbook and message templates to leverage LinkedIn productively throughout the entire sales process, including research, lead generation, appointment setting, nurturing, creating a consensus, running insights calls, and referrals. 

And it is essential to reinforce the right activities at the right time to maximize adoption and get measurable results.

If you are exploring ways to leverage LinkedIn or Sales Navigator, let’s chat. Whether or not we decide to work together, I am confident that our call will be full of insights and actionable steps that can help you grow your business. 

Here's a link to my calendar ScheduleaCallwithBrynne.com please pick a time that works best for you.

215.499.0499 |  brynne.tillman@socialsaleslink.com

contact.summary:
John Kraski is the author of the upcoming book, The Future of Community. As an executive and creator for some of the top Web3 companies worldwide, including a Mark Cuban venture-backed NFT technology platform and currently a Metaverse technology platform, he is passionate about educating brands and consumers about the world of Web3. More importantly, he loves helping brands, and consumers leverage this technology to build strong communities.

Before entering the Web3 space, he has worked in various executive positions at Fortune 1000 companies, including KPMG, PwC, JP Morgan, and the Walt Disney Company. He also holds an MBA in Entertainment from the University of Southern California.

He also is the host of the NFT Heat TV show on Altrd.TV which is distributed on Apple, Amazon, and Roku and in 65M+ homes. It recently was announced he will also be the host of the new TV show The Future of Community.

profile_positions.description:
Land Vault was started by a team of web3 natives who set out to build a studio of the top metaverse builders and developers from across the world. We wanted to become the center of excellence and the "go-to" resource for creativity, imagination, and build-quality for brands wanting to enter the metaverse.

Not too long after establishing ourselves as the leader in metaverse building, we began working with Admix, a pioneer in helping major brands become relevant in virtual worlds across the gaming universe through their technology and development team.

As synergies became more aligned over time, we merged into a single entity that can provide a suite of solutions for major brands to enter the metaverse and virtual worlds with meaningful interaction and purpose.

Today, Land Vault is the world's leading metaverse development studio with over 100 employees worldwide, a powerful community of experts, and a leadership team that is always pushing the boundaries of what is possible for the future.

This is why we are the chosen metaverse resource for many of the world's largest brands.

contact.summary:
Sometimes called the “man from the future”, Tom is recognized as one of the world’s leading thought leaders in augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR) and wearable technology. He is a verified Top Voice on LinkedIn.

A pioneer in this space, Tom started working in augmented reality in 2009 and has over a decade-long track record of running tech teams and providing strategic direction in emerging technologies for powerhouse brands and organizations. 

As Director of Product Management for AR Platforms at Niantic, Tom is responsible for product strategy and product development of Niantic's augmented reality tools and products including Lightship ARDK, 8th Wall, and AR Ads. He leads a passionate team of product managers who are equipping developers, agencies, and brands with powerful tools to create AR experiences. Previous to this, Tom was responsible for product strategy, product development, and product marketing for 8th Wall, Niantic's WebAR platform. In 2022, 8th Wall was acquired by Niantic. Tom was the VP of Product at 8th Wall leading product and marketing since 2019. 

Prior to joining 8th Wall, Tom played a critical role in building the AR/VR/Wearables community. In 2013, Tom founded We Are Wearables which he grew to the largest wearable tech community of its kind. It was acquired by AugmentedReality(dot)org, the non-profit behind AWE, the world's #1 spatial computing community. At AWE, Tom produced conference & expos and meetups and expanded its community globally.

Tom is an investor in the AR/VR ecosystem, making select angel investments in this space. Previously, he was one of the founding partners at Super Ventures, a Silicon Valley based VC fund dedicated to early stage investing in AR with investments made during his time including Gravity Sketch, Forcite, Cognitive3D, Quantum Capture and 6D.ai (acquired by Niantic).

Tom's past experience also includes reporting on the AR/VR/Wearables space. He was a freelance journalist for various tech publications and a wearable tech expert on a recurring TV segment on Canada's largest morning show. In 2012, Billion-dollar revenue global events leader, UBM, acquired Tom’s influential blog about wearable tech, which was one of the earliest sources of news and analysis in the sector.

Tom’s thoughts on AR/VR and wearables have been featured on major publications such as CNN, BBC, Forbes and NY Times and on stage at conferences such as TEDx, Slush, CES, Festival de Cannes, Elevate, SXSW, SPIE & Siggraph.

Opinions posted on Tom's feed are his alone. Contact Tom at tom@tomemrich.com.

profile_positions.description:
Tom is the product lead for Niantic's Augmented Reality (AR) Platforms which includes Lightship ARDK, 8th Wall, and AR Ads. His team of passionate product managers are on a mission to equip developers, agencies, and brands with powerful tools to create augmented reality experiences. In his role, he is responsible for defining the product vision and product strategy which is then used for roadmap planning, roadmap development, and backlog prioritization. He collaborates with cross-functional leaders and senior executives across the organization to achieve business objectives and product goals.  

Lightship Augmented Reality Developer Kit (ARDK) is Niantic's native application software development kit (SDK) for Unity. ARDK brings world understanding technology— depth, meshing, semantics—together with Lightship VPS and multiplayer services to enable developers to create more realistic and diverse AR experiences that work across iOS and Android smartphones.

8th Wall is the world's leading WebAR platform enabling developers with tools to create augmented reality content that works in the browser — no app required. 8th Wall offers developers a cloud-based IDE which supports development with popular 3D rendering frameworks such as A-Frame and three.js together with 8th Wall's proprietary AR Engine which enables World AR, Human AR, Image Target and VPS experiences. 8th Wall also features Metaversal Deployment which allows developers to build an immersive website once and deploy it everywhere including smartphones, computers, and mixed reality headsets such as the Meta Quest. 

AR Ads is a revolutionary new advertising product from Niantic which engages consumers with branded content in the real-world around them. This includes Niantic's In-Game Rewarded AR Ad format available in its popular real-world games like Pokémon GO. Players engage with interactive experiences within these ad units while they move around in the real-world to unlock rewards within the game.
profile_positions.title: Director of Product Management, Augmented Reality Platforms

profile_positions.description:
Tom led product strategy, product development and product marketing of Niantic's web-based augmented reality development platform, 8th Wall. 

8th Wall is the world's leading WebAR platform equipping developers, agencies and brands with a complete set of tools to create web-based augmented reality content — no app required. Among many powerful capabilities, 8th Wall features Metaversal Deployment which enables developers to build once and deploy everywhere including smartphones, computers and now mixed reality headsets.

Learn more at 8thwall.com.

Niantic is a leader in augmented reality best known for its popular AR games such as Pokémon GO, Ingress, Pikmin Bloom, Monster Hunter Now and Peridot.
profile_positions.title: Director of Product Management, 8th Wall

profile_positions.description: Investing and advising startups helping to usher in spatial computing.
profile_positions.title: Investor & Advisor

profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description:
Tom led product and marketing at 8th Wall as VP of Product from 2019-2022. In March of 2022, 8th Wall was acquired by Niantic, a leader in augmented reality and best known for Pokémon GO.

8th Wall is on a mission to make augmented reality for everyone and we are doing this by equipping developers, agencies and brands with tools to create augmented reality for the web or what is best known as WebAR.
profile_positions.title: VP of Product

profile_positions.description:
Tom was an advisor for eyecandylab. eyecandylab's computer-vision software solution uses videos as a trigger for augmented reality content on mobile devices and AR glasses.

eyecandylab was acquired by Accedo in February 2023.
profile_positions.title: Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Tom was a board member of AugmentedReality.org the non-profit organization behind AWE, the world's #1 spatial computing event series and community.

AugmentedReality.org (AR.ORG) advances Augmented Reality to advance Humanity. Our moonshot goal is to Inspire 1 Billion active users of augmented reality by 2020. 

AR.ORG unites hundreds of companies, and thousands of entrepreneurs, engineers and designers – committed to advancing Augmented Reality – an emerging technology that digitizes interaction with the physical world.

Learn more at https://www.augmentedreality.org/
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description: Tom was a co-organizer of AWE Nite SF, the San Francisco AWE Nite meetup chapter and the largest augmented reality meetup group in the Bay area. He worked with the organizing team to plan and produce regular meetup events (both virtual and in-person) and to grow and nurture the San Francisco AR community.
profile_positions.title: Co-Organizer: AWE Nite SF

profile_positions.description:
Tom was co-producer at AWE for nearly 6 years producing all AWE conference and expos in the USA, Europe, China and MEA and supported and grew a network of meetups globally.  

With over a decade in the space, Augmented World Expo (AWE) is the leading AR/VR event series in the world. AWE hosts four annual events (Silicon Valley, Munich, Asia, Tel Aviv) and has meetup chapters all over the world. Forbes calls AWE “the most essential AR/VR conference and expo.” 

AWE also supports a network of independently organized meetup chapters dedicated to building a hub for augmented reality in their city called AWE Nites. There are currently 16 AWE Nite meetups around the world including Tokyo, Tel Aviv, Berlin, Chicago, LA, New York, San Francisco, Phoenix, Vancouver and Toronto.

AWE is owned and operated by AugmentedReality.org, a non-profit organization on a mission to advance augmented reality to advance humanity.

Learn more at www.awexr.com or on Twitter @ARealityEvent
profile_positions.title: Co-Producer

profile_positions.description:
Tom was a Mentor for the RLab. 

A partnership between New York City and its universities, RLab is the nation’s first city-funded center for research, education and entrepreneurship in virtual and augmented reality and related technologies.

The RLab supports new ventures in VR and AR and spatial computing by connecting early-stage companies and entrepreneurs to resources, funding, mentors and a community of support. Learn more at https://www.rlab.nyc/venture-programs.
profile_positions.title: Mentor

profile_positions.description: Tom was a mentor and advisor for Super Ventures, an early stage fund dedicated to augmented reality.
profile_positions.title: Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Tom was one of the founding partners of Super Ventures, the first early stage funded dedicated to augmented reality (AR). 

Super Ventures leverages in-depth expertise and extensive ecosystem relationships to selectively invest in promising companies that enhance perception, situational awareness, and power to act — creating computer-mediated “superpowers” through Augmented Reality, unleashing our full potential.

Investments include: Gravity Sketch, 6D.ai (acquired by Niantic), Forcite, Quantum Capture, Nitero, Cognitive 3D and more. Learn more about Super Ventures and view its portfolio of startups at www.superventures.com.
profile_positions.title: Partner

profile_positions.description: Tom was a mentor for The WXR Fund. The WXR Fund invests in early stage companies with significant female leadership that are creating solutions for the next wave of computing.  Learn more at https://wxrfund.com/
profile_positions.title: Mentor

contact.summary:
There once was a girl from Yorkshire, a salesgirl through and through, but when it came to cold calling she didn’t understand what to do. 
 
She would call and call, and call some more until the day was through,
but when she thought about it, there had to be a simpler way that someone knew! 

So she tried different ways to reach them, mailshots, events, and drop-ins too. 
She even lip-synced to songs online to draw attention from you.

But, after all the trialing she found to her delight, social media was the way forward, even if her faces did give some a fright. 

Now, the way we buy is changing, it's exciting, fun, and new! 
But, are you struggling to find a way to reach new clients too?

Now I can help you, generate leads,  as well as training your staff in marketing too.

zFull.summary:
There once was a girl from Yorkshire, a salesgirl through and through, but when it came to cold calling she didn’t understand what to do. 
 
She would call and call, and call some more until the day was through,
but when she thought about it, there had to be a simpler way that someone knew! 

So she tried different ways to reach them, mailshots, events, and drop-ins too. 
She even lip-synced to songs online to draw attention from you.

But, after all the trialing she found to her delight, social media was the way forward, even if her faces did give some a fright. 

Now, the way we buy is changing, it's exciting, fun, and new! 
But, are you struggling to find a way to reach new clients too?

Now I can help you, generate leads,  as well as training your staff in marketing too. 
All you need to remember is people buy people, not me, but you! 

Be it my content, full marketing or training, I promise we will get you through.
As with my help and guidance, I can help you stand out too. 

If you want to know more about the solutions I offer, drop me an email at: 

jem@socialjems.co.uk
socialjems.co.uk

projects.description:
Serialization is about allocating a unique serial number to the lowest usable or saleable unit. Regulatory agencies in many countries mandate Serialization as a way of improving patient safety by identifying counterfeit medications. 
Drug manufacturers are therefore required to implement Serialization capabilities within their impacted manufacturing processes, the result being significant costs in operations. The company has adopted a decentralized approach which means Serialization capabilities are replicated at numerous plants.  The Overall cost to implement Serialization is approximate $1.2M for the first line and $600K for each additional line within the same facility.    
The majority of the costs associated with Serialization implementation comes from the Hardware and software purchases. There are also reoccurring costs to maintain IT solutions lifecycle costs, which adds significantly to the overall plant overhead cost structure. 
The goal of our project is to conduct an evaluation/cost-benefit analysis of a proposed centralized approach to support company's operations which ultimately will help the company decide whether implementing such an approach will have any long term cost saving benefits.

projects.description: In this project we analysed the operations strategy of the BMW company. The project essentially defines the organisation as a conversion process. It explores how the BMW company sets-up its operations and makes them coherent with their overall operations strategy. It defines the key aspects of directing, designing, managing and improving the operations systems which addresses an understanding of the operations function in a global context. The project provided a theoretical framework for thinking about operations in both manufacturing and service contexts of the organisation and recommended practical applications for its operations management.

projects.title: Operations Management

projects.description: Achieved a high award for this project in the MBA program. The project examines the efficacy of the Primary, Secondary & Territory education system in Brazil over time impacting the growth of its economy and then makes recommendation to improve the system using world class benchmark standards for our client, The Education Minister of Brazil. We evaluate Brazil's education system by analyzing the World Bank data available to identify its progress over the last 30 years and then compare this data with other South American countries to understand the standard of progress in this region. The project then identifies a benchmark education system such as Switzerland, co-relates its economic growth with its efficacy in education system and then makes recommendation of such standards to the Education Minister of Brazil. The benchmark standard is identified by using statistical tools of collection, interpretation and analysis of qualitative and quantitative data to inform decision making for the Education Minister. The project pays close attention to the understanding and modelling of variability, uncertainty and risk and of multiple, conflicting priorities leading to identification of relationships in data, forming correlation with economic indicators and then making possible recommendations and forecasts to the education minister.

projects.title: Analytical Support for Decision Making

projects.description: A strategy based scenario building project carried out for our client "Asian Development Bank"​ in regards to the economic development operations in "Developing Member Countries" such as Kazakhstan. The project examines the countries contextual (or macro) environment ‘driving forces’, the large-scale fundamental forces in the environment and their causal and inter-relatedness that bring about change in the patterns and trends that we identified as underpinning observable events effecting the performance of the existing Millennium Development Goals in Kazakhstan. On the basis of such assumptions the projects makes prediction of various scenarios as an outcome in the future and makes necessary recommendations to the client to prepare for such uncertainties in the future. The time horizon used for this project was 2015 to 2030.

projects.description: This project aims to investigate and devise solution for enhancing the scalability and reliability of a Big Data Cyber Security Analytics (BDCA) System deployed on an OpenStack cluster.  Overview: BDCA encompasses a breed of systems that leverage Big Data technologies (e.g., Hadoop and Spark) for analysing security event data to protect organizational networks, computers, and data from cyber attacks. The volume, velocity, and variety of data directed towards an organizational network is getting increased day by day, which requires highly scalable and reliable BDCA system to analyse the data in real-time for detecting and preventing the attacks. In the context of BDCA, scalability measures how easily a system grows its ability to analyse the increasing amount of security event data and Reliability measures how long a BDCA system runs before experiencing a failure. The goal of this project is to investigate the scalability and reliability of the system with to first answer two questions – (i) which big data framework (i.e., Hadoop or Spark) is more scalable and reliable (ii) which Machine Learning (ML) algorithm (i.e., K-means or XGBoost) is more scalable and reliable. After the investigation, the project aims to devise a solution for enhancing the scalability and reliability of the system.

contributors.headline: Assistant Professor | Australia | Computer Science | Big Data Lead | Program Director | Cyber Security

projects.title: Scalable and Reliable Big Data Cyber Cyber Security Analytics

projects.description: Apache has provided online forums (e.g., for Hadoop and Spark) to developers to discuss issues related to big data frameworks such as configuration and performance optimization issues. From 2013 -2019, more than 300, 000 questions have been asked and answered on these forums. In this project, we aim to explore and understand what issues users commonly face when working with big data frameworks. We also aim to categorize the common issues into topics and sub-topics and provide a shared understanding of handling the issues. The project will use a mixed-method approach combining topic modelling techniques and qualitative analysis to mine and analyse the posts.

contributors.headline: Assistant Professor | Australia | Computer Science | Big Data Lead | Program Director | Cyber Security

projects.title: What Big Data Developer Ask?

projects.description: A BDCA system utilises big data tools in order to analyse large amounts of network traffic and identify threats. The systems can be implemented using big data tools like Hadoop and Apache Spark. This project aims to investigate what impact spark configuration parameters had on the performance of a BDCA system. The project will obtain its results by implementing a BDCA system through spark and measuring its performance with different parameter values. Tests will be performed with five separate machine learning algorithms and datasets. The obtained results are expected to demonstrate the impact of each of the parameters tested on six metrics. These results will highlight the significance of optimised parameter tuning on the performance of a BDCA system.

contributors.headline: Assistant Professor | Australia | Computer Science | Big Data Lead | Program Director | Cyber Security

projects.title: Impact of Spark Configuration Parameters on the Performance of Big Data Cyber Security Analytics Systems

projects.description: This project aimed to develop a tool that takes the generated security alerts and performance indicators of a Big Data Cyber Security Analytics system (e.g., accuracy and response time) and then visualize them according to various user requirements (e.g., group by attack type).  The tool facilitated the security operator in manual analysis by displaying information using pie charts and bar graphs.  Overview: Big Data Cyber Security Analytics (BDCA) encompasses a breed of systems that leverage big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop and Spark) for analysing security event data (network traffic) to protect organizational networks, computers, and data from cyber attacks. The system presents the security alerts to the security administrators in a sequential manner without much support for advanced visualization. For example, presenting the alerts grouped by attack type, IP range, time windows and victim IPs using graphs and charts. Furthermore, the response time of the system is logged separately by the underlying big data framework (Hadoop), which further complicates the job of the security administrator to view the details in one place. Similarly, the accuracy of the system is all alone visualized in another window. The tool is able to visualize the information at different levels of details such as filtering out data and linking and brushing the alerts to correlate and analyse the alerts.

contributors.headline: Assistant Professor | Australia | Computer Science | Big Data Lead | Program Director | Cyber Security

projects.title: A Tool for Visualizing Big Data Cyber Security Analytics

projects.description: This project aimed to design and implement a network security analytic system that incorporates various big data analytics tools and platforms for analysing network events to identify cyber-attacks. The project used C4.5 decision tree algorithm and XGBoost recursive tree algorithm to develop two detecting systems. Both systems were used to extract critical information from network logs for detecting cyber-attacks. The system was implemented using state-of-the-art big data technologies such as Hadoop and Spark and distributed libraries for implementing machine learning and deep learning algorithms. The effectiveness of the system, in terms of attack detection, was tested using security datasets such as KDD and DARPA.

contact.summary:
PVT is a Mentor of Change at NITI Aayog, the government's think tank that aims to foster innovation and entrepreneurship in India. As a Mentor for Change, she is associated with the Atal Innovation Mission, a digital initiative that mentors, prepares, and incubates young minds, startups, and SMEs to become self-reliant brands and businesses. She is also an internationally certified Growth-Mindset Coach, Founder of Individual CSR led community campaigns such as #SupportSaturdays, and an Angel Investor, passionate about empowering and uplifting people and communities through mental resilience and wellness.

With over 20 years of corporate experience, PVT is a new-age marketing, brand and digital business leader. She has crafted marketing and business growth strategies for consumer-first industries, such as BFSI, fintech, telecom, media, heavy engineering, wellness, sports, technology, and startups. She is a former CMO of ABML, a part of Aditya Birla Capital, the financial services arm of the global business conglomerate Aditya Birla Group. She led various mandates as a functional head and a board member of ABML, including the company's first digital PFM business, Aditya Birla Money MyUniverse. She also drove digital transformation by building a real-time analytics platform to digitize the L&D efforts at Aditya Birla Capital. She is an award-winning marketing professional, listed amongst the Top 50 CMOs in India, and a co-author of a unique e-book featuring 50 women corporate leaders from across the globe.

She can be reached at www.poonamvijaythakkar.com

education.degree_name: Accredited - Growth Mindset Coach / Success Conversion Coaching

education.field_of_study: Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services

profile_positions.description:
As a Mentor for Change, I am associated with a one-of-a-kind digital initiative launched by the Government of India - the Atal Innovation Mission - under the vision of Hon'ble Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi ji. The goal of this initiative is to Mentor, digitally prepare our country's younger population/startups/MSME's and SME's, grow along with the growth trajectory of us as a country. This with a vision to build the skill-set, incubate startups and lead them towards becoming self-reliant businesses. Through this excellent initiative, Atal Tinkering Labs focuses on educational leadership of our country on the global map through capacity building of mentors and NGO's across the country.

I "mentor young minds" young startups, MSME and SME's across the country, on various skill-set building topics such as - "Digital Literacy, Marketing & Brand, Startup Foundation, Digital Business Growth, Marketing Strategy, Leadership, Growth-Mindset, Women & Girls' Career Orientation, Financial Literacy, and Empowerment."
profile_positions.title: Mentor of Change

profile_positions.description:
A unique profile created for me. As a part of the Corporate Team at ABCL, I led and directed innovation led digital transformation and an exhaustive Analytics Platform for 12 Lines of Businesses under Aditya Birla Capital Limited the financial services arm of the Aditya Birla Group. It was a company-wide project with the additional responsibility of leading Brand and Digital Communications. 

I was also entrusted under a project to strategies and lead "Employer brand" function for the group and craft it's social media strategy.
profile_positions.title: Head of Analytics & Digital Communications (Learning & Development)

profile_positions.description:
As the founding Head of Marketing of ABCL's first digital PFM platform – www.myuniverse.co.in (Funded by IFC - $9.7 mn), I spearheaded complete gamut of brand, communications, product journey’s and development, market expansion, app downloads, customer experience, NPS, revenue modelling, brand affiliations, media management and internal and external industry body communications along with complete mandate of developing end to end Marketing Strategy, ATL, BTL, Integrated Product Marketing, lead generation and customer acquisition.  

October 2016- I was entrusted with additional portfolio of- Business Head - dormant clients. 
I trained call centre teams on conversions and built smooth customer journey's for re-activation of dormant customers. launched a mega campaign for two million clients, called "The Bumper Offer" activated 35% plus dormant customers, broke records of highest leads from dormant clients in a day, 13 day active campaign did a business of 2 crores, the campaign won several digital marketing innovation awards. 

End-to-end responsible for marketing and communications on a client base of more than 4 million digital customers.
profile_positions.title: Head of Marketing Aditya Birla Money MyUniverse (1st Digital Business of ABCL) Financial Services

profile_positions.description:
I was appointed as the Head of Marketing (a part of the management team and only women in the board of the listed company) to lead the entire gamut of the marketing function for Aditya Birla Money Limited that is a part of Aditya Birla Capital Limited (Formerly known as Aditya Birla Financial Services Group- financial arm of Aditya Birla group). This listed company catered to five different lines of businesses, namely Retail broking, Wealth Management, Online Personal Finance Platform (The first digital platform of the financial services arm of the Aditya Birla group), Corporate Treasury and Real Estate Advisory. As a Functional Head, my role was to manage the brand end – to- end and lead consumer marketing in both B2C and B2B functions. Additionally, I was also responsible for Brand Communications & Management, Digital Acquisitions, Corporate Communications and Media Management. 

My mandate included leading business aligned marketing initiatives across businesses and build effective strategies, brand management, internal & external communication, digital brand building, client acquisition and engagement, standardization & customer championship as a brand custodian for 5 different lines of businesses. 
(Wealth & Distribution, Retail Broking, Corporate Treasury, Real Estate Advisory and Groups first Digital Money Management Platform 
My-Universe). 

Formerly known as - www.adityabirlamoney.com; www.myuniverse.co.in; now www.adityabirlacapital.com
profile_positions.title: CMO/Head of Marketing - Aditya Birla Money Ltd (Part of Financial Services Arm - Aditya Birla Group)

profile_positions.description:
#SupportSaturdays-A Global Digital LinkedIn's 1st Individual-CSR Campaign led by professionals across the Globe.

The Vision of the Campaign This is a movement for professionals, run by professionals for professionals. Its goal is to give hope, give discouraged or laid-off job seekers more visibility in recruiters' networks, improve skills, and change lives.

Every Saturday, under our I-CSR, we re-share and award strategized visibility through our LinkedIn influencer network to the CVs of job-seekers in distress situations. This is a 100% CSR activity.

We also upskill & mentor the younger generation of India to become employable in the digital world.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
#WeToo Voices, is a social impact women - centric platform. launched to empower and enable voices of corporate women leaders. 

The platform designs thoughtful panel discussions on topics that matter at large in our society and in the corporate world. The mission of the campaign is to give women voices a support.  

The community launched it's first ever E-Book, co-authored by 50 global corporate women leaders. 

Book Title - The Corporate Women's Little Diary (Available at Amazon or download at www.wetoo.life 

A collection of stories oF Grit, Wisdom, Perseverance and Vulnerability by TOP GLOBAL CORPORATE WOMEN LEADERS IN ONE E-BOOK.

You can be a part of this community too, write to us, DM us.

Are you an Entrepreneur, Professional or a Student willing to get the Spotlight in your Career or Business ?

You can 📞Reach me on +91-76819 55775 or 📧Write to me at sneha@snehasharma.co.in

If you want to know How I help you get the spotlight? Click "See More" 👉


Hey Hi !! I am Dr. Sneha Sharma, I am LinkedIn Branding Strategist and Founder of Dream Career University. 

🏆I am India's First Career Spotlight Coach.

I believe in the power of personal branding..👑

I help students, professionals and entrepreneurs highlight their career and services by helping them play on their strengths and branding it to the world and getting the 📸 spotlight on them. 

After all that's what we desire for in our life and career. 

▶️ I have spent last twelve years in mentoring and helping other people refine their skills and play on their strengths. 

I truly believe , one should always play on their strengths👑, 

🌼 as where strengths are happiness , joy and fulfilment follow.

I am more of a disciplined, punctual and socializing being. 

 I have coached over 8000+ individuals by helping them analyse their strengths make them into super Strengths and get the SPOTLIGHT , wherever they go. 
 
🎓Being a Doctorate in marketing I have a great command over marketing and branding and crafting media messages. 

🧑‍💻 I am driven by data and creativity both. 

🏆I love being the best I love it when my work is being taken as the best and I can go sleepless, foodless to achieve that, I am driven by passion.

👑My Mantra is Play On Your Strengths and You will always Excel !! 👑

💎When I am not coaching or branding , I am found playing with my little girl and taking care of her.🛴

🏌️‍♂️At times I might be found hitting golf balls at golf course . By the way I did Win two tournaments in 2005

🏊‍♀️I love swimming and 🧑‍🍳 cooking a new vegetarian recipe or crafting something with paper. 

If you want to build your DREAM CAREER or want to highlight your CAREER and get the SPOTLIGHT on you.. 

Hit that Strategy call link. 

You can also message me here on LinkedIn or reach me through my Website

 www.snehasharmathecoach.com 

or on +91-76819 55775

I would love to be part of your Journey !!

And Always remember this one rule of marketing 

" The one that's visible is the one that Sells "

 So make sure to be in the spotlight..

profile_positions.description:
As a LinkedIn Branding Strategist,   I help individuals and businesses build their professional brand on the world's largest professional networking platform. 

My experience in marketing and branding allows me to approach personal branding from a unique perspective.

Through my work, I have seen firsthand the impact that a strong personal brand can have on one's career. 

By optimizing LinkedIn profiles, creating engaging content, and leveraging the platform's tools, I help my clients stand out in a crowded market and attract the right opportunities.

I believe that a successful branding strategy involves a deep understanding of both the individual and their target audience. 

By taking the time to get to know my clients and their goals, I am able to create a personalized plan that resonates with their audience and showcases their unique skills and talents.

In addition to my work as a LinkedIn Branding Strategist, I am also a public speaker. I have spoken on a variety of topics, including personal branding, career development, and corporate training in the workplace.

Overall, my passion for helping others achieve their career goals drives my work as a LinkedIn Branding Strategist. I am dedicated to providing my clients with the tools and knowledge they need to build a strong professional brand and achieve success on LinkedIn and beyond

I believe in the power of personal branding..👑

I help students, professionals and entrepreneurs highlight their career and services by helping them play on their strengths and branding it to the world and getting the 📸 spotlight on them. 

After all that's what we desire for in our life and career. 

▶️ I have spent last twelve years in mentoring and helping other people refine their skills and play on their strengths.

profile_positions.title: Creator & Community Leader

profile_positions.description:
You're still scrolling and reading, so that's a good sign.

A detailed overview of my two coaching tiers:

A) LinkedIn Profile & Content Strategy (Analysis & Recommendations) Report.
I’ll start by reviewing your entire LinkedIn profile, analyzing and providing recommendations for each section. I'll then review your content and provide analysis and guidance based on what you're currently doing and how I think you should be leveraging LinkedIn publishing. The end product is a comprehensive and actionable report in pdf format. 

(B) LinkedIn Profile & Content Strategy Report + Zoom Coaching (60 mins) + Lifetime Support. 
All of the above but with a coaching session with me via Zoom to discuss my recommendations and a deep dive into various content strategies in furtherance of your objectives. Session can be recorded, for future reference and screen sharing will ensure comprehension, easy evaluation of tips/techniques and current analysis/fit of available LinkedIn features. Lifetime Support means that I become your expert on retainer to answer any LinkedIn related queries.

I'll provide information on my process and next steps, when you tell me which of these options you're interested in.
 
andyfoote@hey.com

p.s looking to connect with me and lacking a specific/great reason to connect? Use the code word “Haggis” as/in the invitation message, I'll know you read this far :)

Other stuff....

I was one of 3,500 LinkedIn Audio beta testers. 

Follow me, ring that bell on my profile to (hopefully..) get notified when I post. Click once (to turn it grey) to turn the 'Notify Me Bell' on.

contact.title: Founder
contact.titleDescription:
Pay Agency was founded with the goal of simplifying the process of connecting merchants and payment service providers (PSPs).
We recognized that there was a need for a platform that could streamline the process of finding and onboarding new partners. We set out to create a solution that would meet this need.
Through intensive studies and development, we created a platform for merchants and PSPs. Our platform makes it easy for merchants to compare payment processors and choose the best one for them. Giving PSP access to a large and growing pool of potential clients.

Since our founding, we have worked hard to build a platform that is easy to use, reliable, and secure. We have developed advanced matching algorithms to help PSPs and merchants find the best partners for their needs, and we have put in place robust security measures to protect against fraud and other threats.
In addition to our core platform, we have also focused on building a strong customer support team to ensure that our clients have the help and guidance they need to succeed. We believe that by providing top-notch service and support, we can help our clients grow and thrive.
Looking to the future, we are excited to continue expanding and improving our platform, we are committed to helping merchants and PSPs succeed in an increasingly competitive market.

contact.summary:
🚀💼 Buckle up, because I'm about to take you on a whirlwind journey through the maze of payments, technology, and global infrastructure! My name is Ruchi, and with 17 trailblazing years in the industry, I've seen it all, done it all, and yet, there's still more road to explore.

From partnering with payment giants like Wirecard, Elavon, Firstdata, to teaming up with startups and enterprises, my experiences have sculpted my expertise🔧. Remember the time we tackled that impossible payment integration for a global retailer? We cracked it! Or the innovative payment solution that revolutionized a small business? That was us! 🎉

Honored with awards🏆, certifications, and recognition from industry leaders, my toolkit is not just filled with the latest tech, trends, and regs, but also with creativity, relationship-building, and problem-solving chops🎯.

What drives me? A passion for inventing new solutions💡, a thirst for growth🌱, and a love for collaboration🤝. I thrive under pressure and aim to make everyone feel part of a supportive team👥. My goal? Tackling global payment infrastructure challenges, one creative solution at a time🌍.

Now, I want to hear from YOU! Let's connect, exchange ideas, or even reminisce about those wild payment integrations. Leave a comment, send a connection request, or simply hit that like button if you resonate with my journey! 💌

profile_positions.description:
Payomatix aims to revolutionize the payment industry in India by introducing single API technical solutions to merchants all over the country. Our platform provides state of art, payment aggregator platform, or cashier system – an essential infrastructural component in such an industry to capture the market. We being the access point to the global market, our platform acts as a bridge between merchants and various payment service providers.
 
We offer a single API where merchants have the authority to select and choose the payment gateway they desire to use, which fits best in accordance with their risk appetite. The merchant can select one or various payment gateways at a single point in time.
 
With just a few clicks, we make the payment processing easy. Payomatix’s smart, intelligent routing system, merchants get the option to divert the transaction as per the set rules, thus enabling continuous payment support any day, every day. 

With Payomatix’s offerings, users would find an increase in payment options and minimize the customer dropout ratio. As we are providing the unified payment platform, which will :
Eliminate the repetitive API integration of different payment gateway
It will increase conversion rates
Better customer experience
Access to multiple payment gateways
One-stop dashboard for all transactions

Payomatix is the only platform in India that allows businesses to integrate multiple PSPs
under single API integration with just a few clicks and makes the payment processing easy. 

It gives you access to all payment modes including credit card, debit card, net banking, UPI, and
popular wallets including Paytm, Amazon Pay, etc.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
🔍Pay Agency: Simplifying Merchant-PSP Connections for Success🌟

Founded with the objective of streamlining the connection between merchants and payment service providers (PSPs)🤝, Pay Agency identified the need for a comprehensive platform to facilitate seamless partner onboarding. With diligent research🔬 and development, we crafted a robust platform that enables merchants to easily compare and select the best-suited payment processors, while providing PSPs access to a vast, growing pool of potential clients🌐.

🏆Our Commitment: User-Friendly, Reliable, and Secure Solutions

Since inception, we have dedicated ourselves to creating a user-friendly, dependable, and secure platform. By implementing advanced matching algorithms🧬, we help PSPs and merchants identify the perfect partners for their requirements. Our robust security measures🔒 safeguard against fraud and other potential threats.

💡Top-Notch Customer Support: Guiding Clients to Success

In addition to our core platform, we prioritize building a strong customer support team👥, ensuring our clients receive the assistance and guidance they need to excel. We believe that by offering exceptional service and support, we contribute to our clients' growth and success📈.

🚀The Future: Continued Expansion and Improvement

Excited about the future, we remain committed to enhancing and expanding our platform to better serve merchants and PSPs in a highly competitive market💼. With Pay Agency, expect professional, educational, and interactive experiences designed for your success🌱.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
🚀RaiseMoney streamlines the fundraising process for startups🌟 by offering a comprehensive platform that connects entrepreneurs with the ideal investors💼 in just one click🖱️. We prioritize ease-of-use, featuring a user-friendly interface👩‍💻 to find compatible investors, tailored messaging💬, and ready-to-use pitch templates📄 to facilitate effective partnerships🤝.

As a networking hub for startup founders and investors🌐, RaiseMoney aims to simplify the fundraising experience💡 and eliminate barriers to innovation🔧. Our one-click, targeted investor search🔍 helps startups from around the globe🌍 secure funding💰 and expand their ventures📈.

As a cloud-based software solution☁️, RaiseMoney provides a seamless experience for entrepreneurs seeking funding👨‍💼. The platform not only allows you to connect with the right investors easily but also enables targeted outreach through personalized messages✉️ or conference connections🎤. Listing your project on RaiseMoney takes just a few seconds⏱️, ensuring visibility to investors seeking precisely what your startup offers🎯.

Leverage our ready-to-use pitch templates📝 and send your proposal to the investors of your choice📤. With just a few clicks, you can begin securing the funds💸 your startup needs to thrive🌱!

profile_positions.description:
I know it can seem like everything is just too hard right now. You may be struggling with something, or you may have gone through a difficult experience that has left you feeling hopeless and empty. Maybe you're just tired of being tired and don't know how to get out of the rut you feel like you're in.

But I want to tell you: everything passes. There are times when we think we won’t get through a difficulty, but it passes. There are times in our lives where we feel so desolate and empty, and it seems as if we have “hit rock bottom”, even those moments and periods pass. Such is the nature of this world. Everything passes.

So don't give up on yourself! Remember that there are good days ahead for you—and they might even be tomorrow!

zFull.summary:
🚀💼 Buckle up, because I'm about to take you on a whirlwind journey through the maze of payments, technology, and global infrastructure! My name is Ruchi, and with 17 trailblazing years in the industry, I've seen it all, done it all, and yet, there's still more road to explore.

From partnering with payment giants like Wirecard, Elavon, Firstdata, to teaming up with startups and enterprises, my experiences have sculpted my expertise🔧. Remember the time we tackled that impossible payment integration for a global retailer? We cracked it! Or the innovative payment solution that revolutionized a small business? That was us! 🎉

Honored with awards🏆, certifications, and recognition from industry leaders, my toolkit is not just filled with the latest tech, trends, and regs, but also with creativity, relationship-building, and problem-solving chops🎯.

What drives me? A passion for inventing new solutions💡, a thirst for growth🌱, and a love for collaboration🤝. I thrive under pressure and aim to make everyone feel part of a supportive team👥. My goal? Tackling global payment infrastructure challenges, one creative solution at a time🌍.

Now, I want to hear from YOU! Let's connect, exchange ideas, or even reminisce about those wild payment integrations. Leave a comment, send a connection request, or simply hit that like button if you resonate with my journey! 💌

#PaymentsMaven #TechTrailblazer #GlobalInnovation #LetsConnect

awards.description: We are thrilled to announce that Payomatix, our cutting-edge fintech startup, has been honored with the prestigious Fintech Startup Innovation Award from Krypton. This recognition underscores our relentless commitment to revolutionizing the financial technology landscape and highlights the exceptional strides we have made in delivering innovative solutions to our users. The award from Krypton serves as a testament to our team's dedication, creativity, and pioneering spirit in shaping the future of fintech. We are immensely proud of this achievement and look forward to continuing our mission of driving innovation in the industry.

awards.title: NBFC Leadership Awards 2023

awards.description:
Embarking on this journey, we've strived for the stars, and it fills me with immense pride to announce that Payomatix has been bestowed with the coveted 'India's Emerging Fintech Brand 2023' award at the esteemed GREATEST BRANDS & LEADERS 2023 event held in Dubai! This recognition echoes our unwavering dedication to reshape the fintech landscape through groundbreaking solutions.

Marked our calendars for the live telecast on ET Now on 22nd and 23rd July 2023, a moment that encapsulated our pride and hard work. I extend my deepest gratitude to our exceptional team and loyal clients whose unwavering support has propelled us to this remarkable milestone. As we bask in this achievement, we look forward with enthusiasm to the journey ahead, brimming with even more glorious victories.
awards.title: Fintech Innovation Excellence of the Year Award

awards.description:
I am thrilled to share the fantastic news that Payomatix has emerged victorious, securing the prestigious 'India's Emerging Fintech Brand 2023' award at the renowned GREATEST BRANDS & LEADERS 2023 event in Dubai! This remarkable achievement stands as a true testament to our relentless commitment to reshaping the fintech landscape through innovative and robust solutions.

This recognition not only underscores the uniqueness of our platform but also embodies the passion, perseverance, and teamwork of each member of our Payomatix family. It's a result of united efforts that have propelled us to this significant milestone.

As the saying goes, "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." This accolade serves as a source of motivation to keep pushing boundaries in the fintech sector, striving for excellence, and delivering an exceptional experience to our customers.

Here's to a future brimming with growth, innovation, and countless more achievements.
awards.title: India’s Emerging Fintech brand 2023
awards.issuer: Greatest Brands & Leaders 2022-23 Asia Americas Africa

awards.description:
With a heart brimming with gratitude and a sense of profound accomplishment, I am thrilled to share the remarkable news of receiving the "Women Entrepreneur of the Year" award for the second consecutive year, now in 2023. This esteemed recognition stands as a testament to the enduring commitment, unwavering perseverance, and relentless pursuit of excellence that have guided my entrepreneurial journey.

To be acknowledged once again for this prestigious honor is a humbling experience. It reinforces the belief that dedication, innovation, and a steadfast vision can lead to remarkable achievements. This award is not just a celebration of my individual efforts, but a tribute to the collective strength of a dedicated team and the unending support of those who believe in our mission.

As I reflect on this achievement, I am reminded of the countless women who continue to challenge norms, break barriers, and drive positive change in various spheres. This award is a tribute to their resilience and a reminder that no dream is too ambitious to achieve.

I extend my heartfelt gratitude to the organizers for recognizing the role of women entrepreneurs in shaping the future of business. To all the aspiring entrepreneurs, especially women, let this serve as a testament to the potential that lies within each of us. Together, we can inspire, innovate, and lead with purpose, making an indelible mark on the world.
awards.title: Women Entrepreneur of the Year Award 2023

awards.description:
I am thrilled to share that our team had the incredible opportunity to attend the esteemed International Icons of Excellence Awards ceremony, held at The Umrao, Hotels & Resorts in Delhi 💢

The event was a celebration of the most revolutionary and game-changing startups and entrepreneurs in the tech industry, and I couldn't have been more excited to be part of the attendees.

The highlight of the evening was undeniably the moment when I, as the founder of our venture, was called up on stage to accept the "Most Promising Payment Services for Startups" award. 

As the saying goes, "Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out." This achievement is a testament to our dedicated team's consistent hard work and innovation. Onward and upward!
awards.title: Most Promising Payment Services for Startups

awards.description:
Leadership Excellence Awards recognized varied organizations and professionals from all over India based on their product and service quality, pricing, marketing strategies and leadership strategy in the industry/market segment/geography, dedication to customer satisfaction, entrepreneur initiatives, exemplary business practices, business growth, etc.

The ceremony was meant to appreciate the contribution of organizations and business leaders who are the true inspiration of our future generation.
awards.title: Leadership Excellence Awards 2023

awards.description:
It is with immense gratitude and pride that I share the wonderful news of being honored with the prestigious "Women Entrepreneur of the Year" award for the year 2022. This recognition is a testament to the relentless dedication, passion, and resilience that have been at the heart of my journey.

As an entrepreneur, I've always believed in pushing boundaries, overcoming challenges, and charting new paths. This award not only celebrates individual achievement but also underscores the collective efforts of an exceptional team that has worked tirelessly to turn dreams into reality.

I am deeply humbled by this recognition and extend my heartfelt appreciation to the organizers for acknowledging the contributions of women in the world of business. To fellow entrepreneurs, aspiring individuals, and the incredible women who continue to shatter glass ceilings – remember, your vision and determination can lead to remarkable accomplishments. Let us continue to inspire and empower one another as we forge ahead on this remarkable journey.
awards.title: Women Entrepreneur of the Year Award 2022

contact.titleDescription:
Unlock your revenue potential. After 20 years carrying a bag, advising 200 tech companies, and coaching 1,000+ reps, bestselling author Justin Michael ("Tech-Powered Sales") codified the most robust outbound methodology in B2B history – Justin Michael Method (JMM)* – and has become one of the leading executive coaches in B2B. 

*Download all my free, open-source CODEX guides that have driven billions in pipeline. 
(Serious coaching inquiries and paid speaking only, please) 

Now more about our GTM agency: 

"Sales leaders, we feel your pain." 

Traditional outbound approaches are not working. It’s time to innovate and breakthrough.

Driving revenue behind a weak brand is like pushing a boulder uphill. Once we fix your positioning, we pour kerosene on your outbound sales process. We believe all pistons must fire together to create an efficient revenue engine to grow scalably. We understand this deeply as a former VP of Sales and CMO. 

Our GTM agency is laser-focused on fixing your core GTM, so it converts far better when you sell against it. Services include tech stack optimization, sequence architecture, outbound sales training, ICP/persona development.

"Justin Michael is the Obi-Wan Kenobi of opening conversations. Justin trains you to think holistically rather than relying on tactics, stratagems, or playbooks. contact.summary:
Jacob is also a former NFL athlete turned serial entrepreneur, transformational speaker, and writer. He is a 3x TEDx speaker, was 40 Under 40, and has been featured in Forbes, Wall Street Journal, and Good Morning America. He travels globally speaking to corporations, colleges, and sports teams about how to take failure and turn it into fuel. His mission is simple - Fail Forward. He believes that life is not about how many times you fall, but how many times you get up. He is passionate about empowering others to overcome challenges and achieve their goals.

Jacob is a co-founder and chief branding officer at Varlo Inc, a company that helps businesses create and communicate their unique value proposition. He is also a keynote speaker at TEDxDetroit, where he shares his insights and stories on redesigning brands and lives. With almost two decades of experience in creative direction and digital media, he has led and supported clients such as Meta, UPS, Ford, UPS and more.

Ready to connect? Text or call me @ 248-805-6903 or email me at jacob@failforwardbrown.com

WHAT CAN I DO FOR YOUR BUSINESS?

✔Serve delicious words on the platter to satisfy the cravings of your target audience to understand your business in a better way.

✔Help you grow your business by creating well researched and engaging blog posts, website content, social media content and more.

✔ Help you build an amazing LinkedIn profile to grow your engagements by manifolds.

✔ Create LinkedIn posts for you and your business to enhance the online presence and improve your visibility. 

WHAT ALL I HAVE DONE IN THE FIELD OF WRITING?

➡️Got an opportunity to cover blog stories of Prime Minister and eminent personalities at Economic Summit 2023 by ET Insights. 

➡️Featured writer in Thrive Global, Hackernoon, Medium, BBN Times, etc.

➡️Conducted seminars and workshops in renowned colleges like SRCC, DTU, Chitkara University, Fuzia, Chandigarh University, Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Management Studies, Lady Shree Ram (LSR), NSUT, PGDAV College, IIIT Kottayam, IIT Kharagpur.

contact.summary:
I write, coach and consult about how to find and close mega deals.

The backstory is that have been a career enterprise seller for over twenty years. I learned the art of closing mega deals - uncommonly large and complex enterprise agreements - in 2012 when I closed my first $50,000,000 deal at Oracle. 

I went on to close two more in the following six years and in the process, found my professional passion. 

My Mega Deal Secrets masterclass is the only coaching experience of its kind, attended by ambitious sellers from Salesforce, Oracle, VMware, Outreach, Cisco, Seismic, DocuSign, LucidChart, Dynatrace, Gartner, Teradata, Celonis and many more.

Mega Deal Secrets is my new book which tells the story of my first mega deal journey in detail and is now being read, shared and used as an advanced selling blueprint among tech sales teams from start ups to public companies.

Fast-growing scale ups engage me to upskill their enterprise sellers and to work with management to establish a mega deal selling framework which works with whatever selling methodology they currently adhere to (Command the Message, Corporate Visions, Miller Heiman, Sandler, etc.)

Get the book: megadealsecretsbook.com
Book a masterclass interview: https://calendly.com/megadealsecrets/30min
Discuss consulting or speaking engagements: jamal@megadealsecrets.com

Enterprise Sellers is where top 1% sales executives come to network, learn and grow.

You shouldn’t have to remain isolated at your company with lackluster training and peers motivated less than you. Sellers accepted to our community get access to what they need to move up and experience a seismic shift in their performance. We’ve built a supportive peer-based network, with the resources, expertise and contacts to open the doors to life-changing opportunities.

When you’re accepted into the Enterprise Sellers network, you’ll be rubbing shoulders with a thriving community of executives and mega deal experts from blue chip SaaS and tech companies. We only accept the very top performing reps and those committed to sharing, learning and growing together as a community of excellence.

zFull.summary:
I write, coach and consult about how to find and close mega deals.

The backstory is that have been a career enterprise seller for over twenty years. I learned the art of closing mega deals - uncommonly large and complex enterprise agreements - in 2012 when I closed my first $50,000,000 deal at Oracle. 

I went on to close two more in the following six years and in the process, found my professional passion. 

My Mega Deal Secrets masterclass is the only coaching experience of its kind, attended by ambitious sellers from Salesforce, Oracle, VMware, Outreach, Cisco, Seismic, DocuSign, LucidChart, Dynatrace, Gartner, Teradata, Celonis and many more.

Mega Deal Secrets is my new book which tells the story of my first mega deal journey in detail and is now being read, shared and used as an advanced selling blueprint among tech sales teams from start ups to public companies.

Fast-growing scale ups engage me to upskill their enterprise sellers and to work with management to establish a mega deal selling framework which works with whatever selling methodology they currently adhere to (Command the Message, Corporate Visions, Miller Heiman, Sandler, etc.)

Get the book: megadealsecretsbook.com
Book a masterclass interview: https://calendly.com/megadealsecrets/30min
Discuss consulting or speaking engagements: jamal@megadealsecrets.com

An expert with 15+ years of experience in Marketing, Brand Building, Strategy Development and E-commerce, she is your go-to-person for all things related to China e-commerce and digital marketing.

Besides being a successful entrepreneur backed by numerous awards such as the EY Entrepreneurial Winning Woman, Global Bridge German Chinese Young Leader, etc., Moonie is also a renowned China expert, keynote speaker, influencer, and female leadership advocator.

Based in Hamburg (Germany) and Shanghai (China), eTOC assists international brands thrive in China through its expert knowledge and know-knows with regards to e-commerce and digital marketing. Over 150 international brands have trusted eTOC with their businesses in China.

contact.summary:
I post my team's research results on venture capital and startups on my LinkedIn page. Please follow to get updates. I post insights from my Angel & VC class on Instagram: @ilyastrebulaev 

Ilya Strebulaev is a tenured chaired Professor of Finance and Private Equity at the Stanford Graduate School of Business. He is an expert in venture capital, private equity, entrepreneurial finance, innovation, corporate finance, and financial decision-making. His work has been published in major academic journals and received numerous prizes and awards. His research has also been featured in a variety of public media, including The New York Times and The Wall Street Journal.

Ilya is the founder and faculty director of the Stanford GSB Venture Capital Initiative that brings together academic researchers and practitioners to advance and promote research and teaching on innovation and venture capital.  

At Stanford, Ilya teaches on venture capital, angel financing, and private equity. He has been honored with the GSB MBA Distinguished Teacher Award, the highest award Stanford MBA students can bestow on a professor. 

Ilya is involved in educating business leaders on venture capital, the ecosystem of Silicon Valley, corporate innovation, strategic financial decision-making, funding of innovation, and investing in the VC industry and VC-backed companies. He frequently leads executive workshops and gives keynote speeches on these topics around the world. He also has been consulting global companies and investors. He also serves as an expert witness in litigation matters.

Welcome to my profile; I'm Kevin D. Turner, Managing Partner of TNT Brand Strategist, a technology and business-focused Organizational and Personal Brand Builder with deep expertise in Visioneering, Communications, Culture Building, and creating Disruptive Advantages. My passion for talent development and cultivating high-performance teams globally while profitably managing, branding, and growing organizations, has contributed to my career success.

projects.description:
Discovered that American Heart Association, Emergency Cardiovascular Care did not have direct final customer contact, sales insights and training center ratings. The relationship with the certificate holder was through a second party training facility. AHA had no feedback or way of checking on quality controls directly through certificate holders.

Conceptualized, project managed and launched a global cloud SaaS CRM certificate verification system, CPRverify, allowing AHA, for the first time, direct customer contact, sales and training center ratings. CPRverify is based on a global secure database that verified cards by secure manual, instructor and center coding. Platform is built with consideration to deliver ePublishing sales in the future.

Biggest challenges: 
•	C-Level, Board, Volunteer and Staff understanding of the need and earning support of a non-budgeted technology launch.
•	Legal Departments knowledge of International Data Management and SaaS security processes.

Biggest Rewards:
•	Reduction in Fraud (Card, Book, Traing Center and Instrutor) resulting in greater revenue and the ability to service more language translations and markets know for piracy.
•	Direct communication with Certificate holders and Instructors.
•	Student ranking of Training Centers to reward exceptional performance and pinpoint improvements needed. 

CPRverify was designed specifically to support our dedicated training network. This online tool enables students, instructors, and training centers to quickly verify training completed by an authorized AHA instructor. Verification of training is quick, easy and can be done any day, anytime, 24 hours a day. CPRverify also makes it easier for our training centers to monitor and track all of their training.

This program is only available to authorized American Heart Association Training Centers, instructors, and students who are located outside of the United States. Working together to make a difference and save more lives.

Donated Blood & Plasma to the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC), the world's largest humanitarian network, providing assistance without discrimination as to nationality, race, religious beliefs, class or political opinions. Founded in 1919, the IFRC comprises 189 member Red Cross and Red Crescent National Societies, a secretariat in Geneva and more than 60 delegations strategically located to support activities around the world. The International Federation, the National Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross together constitute the International Red Cross and Red Crescent Movement.

volunteer_experiences.description: Donated Blood & Plasma to Carter BloodCare, a not-for-profit, 501(c)(3) organization that operates on behalf of patients and their loved ones in 54 Texas counties. Carter BloodCare was formed in 1998 through the merger of BloodCare in Dallas and Carter Blood Center located in Fort Worth. In April of 2007, Carter BloodCare announced a merger with Tyler-based Stewart Regional Blood Center. Carter BloodCare is Texas'​ largest blood center, providing more than 330,000 units of lifesaving blood components for patients annually. Carter BloodCare is the primary provider of blood components and transfusion services for approximately 300 Texas health care facilities. These facilities include our region's children's hospitals, central trauma centers, major cancer centers, and transplant centers. Carter BloodCare also provides specialized laboratory and patient care services and physician consultation. Carter BloodCare participates in the education of professionals in transfusion medicine and medical technologists specializing in blood banking.

zFull.summary:
To Pivot, you must first prove it, and then build it into your brand! I know this to be true, as I have successfully pulled off five evolutions in my career. Transitioning from Fortune 50 Sales & Marketing Management to Venture Capital, to Public & Private Turnarounds, Leading a Non-Profit 50 internationally, and finally proving it to myself by turning a side gig into a 10-year successful business.

Welcome to my profile; I'm Kevin D. Turner, Managing Partner of TNT Brand Strategist, a technology and business-focused Organizational and Personal Brand Builder with deep expertise in Visioneering, Communications, Culture Building, and creating Disruptive Advantages. My passion for talent development and cultivating high-performance teams globally while profitably managing, branding, and growing organizations, has contributed to my career success.

 🔘 Optimized 4.8K+ LinkedIn Profiles & Trained 12K+ People on Best Practices since 2005
 🔘 Achieved LinkedIn 5 Star Rating & 200+ Written Recommendations 
 🔘 Developed & Led Teams of 65+ Sales & Marketing Professionals
 🔘 Marketed & Sold $550M+ Domestically & into 140 Countries 
 🔘 Created, Hired & Managed 4 Domestic & Foreign Offices 
 🔘 Lived in the US, Switzerland, Germany & Japan
 🔘 Established International HR & Payroll 
 🔘 CrowdSourced & FundRaised $25.3M
 🔘 Managed Full P&L of $352M

With a Philosophy forged in Customers First, Triple Bottom Line (3PL) "People, Planet & Profit" coupled with a keen Business Acumen and a Personal Resolve to Change the World, I have held Sales, Marketing, and Branding leadership roles with SONY, Stone VC, Thomas Nelson, TurneRRounD, American Teachers, American Heart Association, & TNT Brand Strategist.

 TNT Brand Strategist – Devoted to Your Success
High Touch, Confidential, Never Outsourced, & Tech Aware

contact.summary:
Admond is currently the Founder of Chatted AI. 

He is an entrepreneur, data scientist, speaker and writer. Born and raised in Malaysia, Admond’s path was a little different.

Ever since his childhood, Admond fell in love with Physics and its applications in the society. He was always a hungry and curious kid (yes, he still is) who constantly asked “WHY” behind everything to seek the fundamental truths. Determined. He then studied Physics at Nanyang Technological University (NTU) in Singapore in 2014. 

In the 3rd year of studies, Admond had the opportunity to join an overseas internship at CERN in Switzerland for Compact Muon Solenoid (CMS) experiment on particle physics. He analyzed and simulated petabytes of data via Worldwide LHC Computing Grid — where he found his marriage with Big Data Analytics & Data Science!

From there, Admond discovered his passion in data science and never looked back ever since. As a Physics graduate, he started his career as a data scientist from the online gambling industry (a story for another day), semiconductor field, to the teaching world as a data science instructor to make data science accessible to everyone. 

Throughout this roller-coaster ride, Admond has also been working as an independent data scientist (or data science consultant), helping startups with various data science and machine learning projects for many breakthroughs. 

Admond is also passionate about speaking and writing about data science, marketing and technology. Till now, he has spoken at SPH, DBS, NTU, NUS, New Mexico Highlands University, Nulab Meetup and various conferences, including Data Science UA Conference, Data Science & Marketing Summit. His data science experience and articles have also been featured by various publications, including KDnuggets, Medium, Tech in Asia, and AI Time Journal.

I knew that if I failed I wouldn’t regret that, but I knew the one thing that I might regret is not trying — Jeff Bezos. 

🚀 Today, Admond continues his entrepreneurial journey and he is building Chatted AI to help SMEs make informed decisions 10x faster by getting AI insights from data in seconds.

Admond is always looking to speak about data science/analytics at corporate workshops, conferences, schools, and meetups. For speaking engagement or corporate workshops, just email Admond 📩: admond@hotmail.co.uk

🐦  Twitter: @admond1994
💡  Medium: https://medium.com/@admond1994
📍  Website: https://www.admondlee.com

Admond shares his experience (sometimes mistakes) in data science & startups HERE👇🏻 

https://linktr.ee/admondlee

X10 is a regional influencer marketing agency group that helps brands optimise and execute influencer marketing smarter.

As the early pioneer of influencer marketing over the past 7 years,  X10 Media has acquired extensive expertise through the successful launch of 1,000+ social media campaigns for both MNCs & SMEs, including renowned brands such as Pepsi, Capitaland, Singtel, Warner Music, Casetify, LVMH, OPPO, Michael Kors, Nestle, and numerous others.

X10 media currently owns 3 business units — Faves, X10 Ventures & TheSpokenTribe, that span regionally across 3 countries in Singapore, Malaysia & Indonesia.

🌏 Faves (micro-influencer marketing arm) runs a combined network of 10 million reach in Singapore, Malaysia & Indonesia.

🌏 X10 Ventures (technology arm) empowers brands with our proprietary technology. 

• Leadgram was launched as a first-of-its-kind software in Asia to deepen social media campaign ROI & sales/traffic conversions for brands & companies.
• We retarget consumers that engages on influencers/brand content to create conversations leading to higher call to actions.

🌏 The Spoken Tribe (LinkedIn marketing arm) brings professional voices to endorse companies and brands through the word-of-mouth recommendations.

At Staq, we are building the universal API to help fintech companies securely access financial data from SMEs in a quick and easy way across Southeast Asia.

We are reimagining the technical infrastructure to drive financial inclusion for businesses in Southeast Asia.

Our mission is to empower you to build amazing financial products for businesses with more visibility and informed decisions. 

With Staq:
• You can easily and securely access financial data from businesses for SME lending, user identity verification, compliance and KYC etc. 
• Businesses can instantly share their data instead of sifting through tedious UX from multiple banks to extract bank statements. 

Headquartered in Singapore, Staq is backed by Entrepreneur First, the leading startup incubator in the world.

He's helped executives clarify the moves to grow their business.

Here's a few projects he's done:
• Crafted pricing strategy for a $1B+ SaaS company
• Built new businesses for a $1B+ tech company
• Helped companies enter new countries
• Merged hospital systems and Fintechs

• Ran workshops with 100s of people

Now he shares lessons from these experiences online. He's also writing a book on making strategic business decisions.

These lessons have built him 81,000 followers. And 14,000 readers receive his weekly emails.

Brian is on a mission to help 1 million business executives become better strategic decisions to grow their business by 2028.
