contact.name: John Harrison ⚛
contact.summary:
Do you know how to persuade? 

How to be concise? Or engaging? Or clear? Can you justify every single word in your copy?

Or is copywriting still a mystery?

Are you:

+ 🙅 struggling with low conversions?
+ 🫣 nervous about pressing publish
+ 🙈 hesitant about pressing send?
+ 📉 tired of bad copy costing you money?
+ 🥱 failing to captivate your customers?

There's a logical reason for it, and it's not your fault.

School taught you terribly.

Actually, it's way worse.

They taught you the exact opposite of what you needed to know.

7 ways school screwed you over:

1/ 🥲 Not taught how to persuade or convince
2/ 🫠 Not taught to consider the purpose of writing
3/ 😮‍💨 Not shown what could be edited
4/ 🤡 Feedback was vague like "be more descriptive"
5/ 🥸 Taught to see writing as a cReAtIvE pursuit
6/ 😵‍💫 Grammar was obsessed or glossed over
7/ 🙃 Rewarded for hitting an arbitrary word count 

Whether you know it or not, you're fighting years of that bad training. 

So now:

1/ 🥲 You can’t effectively make your point
2/ 🌪 Your writing is unfocused 
3/ 😮‍💨 Your message is unnecessarily cluttered
4/ 🙄 Your writing lacks depth, so there’s no insight
5/ 🥉 Your writing rarely achieves anything
6/ 😵‍💫 Your writing is either rigid or unstructured
7/ 🙃 Your quantity kills your quality 

Reputation, damaged.
Opportunity, hindered.
Ideas, muted.

EVERYTHING is at risk.

Because words are everything. 
They’re how we make things happen. 
Or not.

Because if you don’t learn how to write well:

1. You’re relying on guesses and luck
2. And other people will out-write you

+ 🤝 They’ll get your client
+ 🤑 They’ll make your money
+ 🗽 They’ll have your freedom
+ 🥰 They’ll land your dream job
+ 💸 They’ll enjoy your pay rise
+ 🚀 They’ll launch your business
+ 👑 They’ll become the authority
+ 💰 They’ll secure your investment
+ 💵 They’ll convince your customers
+ 🥳 They’ll persuade your prospects

They'll dictate your future by better controlling the tools of communication. Words.

But I can help you change that. 
I can give you the power you should have been trained to wield.
I can help you control words.

And well enough to dictate your future, by writing it into existence. 

I’ve spent nearly 10,000 hours copywriting and nearly 500 hours condensing what I’ve learned into my copywriting guide. 

Be concise
Be convincing

Be powerful
Be persuasive

👇

copywriting.io

profile_positions.title: Freelance Copywriter

profile_positions.description:
I was employee #15 and part of the core team that launched Wayhome, a financial services company innovating in the property space with £500 million of institutional capital. As the only words person I sat across product, marketing, and operations writing web copy, emails, landing pages, forms, customer comms, internal guides, and pretty much everything else that needed words.

* I wrote email campaigns with 65%+ unique open rates and 7%+ unique click through rates
* I defined our value proposition, which led to us finding product-market fit 
* I led user research projects to reveal insights about our customers
* I led product focused projects set by senior leadership and exec 
* I trained the company to write well through style, content, tone, and voice guidance
* I wrote FCA compliant copy
profile_positions.title: Copywriter

profile_positions.description:
Jenny Schwarz is the menswear label I co-founded in 2011. It was my baptism of fire in entrepreneurship in, arguably, one of the most competitive industries to launch a new business. In 2015 I raised a £77,000 angel investment for the company.

I created a strong, unique positioning in an extremely crowded market. 'Rugged Elegance' was the identity and narrative that grew from the brand's historical influences in Jenny's Great-Grandfather who was a bespoke tailor and an adventurer. 

Copywriting experience:

•	Created and iterated the branded, digital experience on JennySchwarz.com.
•	Managed social media across multiple platforms including Facebook, Instagram and Pinterest.
•	Wrote press releases, articles for magazines and Q&A for fashion publications.
•	Maintained the company journal, delivering unique content on a daily basis. 
•	Wrote the business plan that secured the company £77,000 of angel investment.
•	Managed all the communication with third-parties including distributors, manufacturers, PR companies, sales agents, journalists and customers. 

Jenny Schwarz has shown collections at London Collections: Men, in Paris and at Vienna Fashion Week attracting clients including Graham Norton, Travis Fimmel, Brooklyn Beckham, Imagine Dragons, Kings of Leon, The Script, Gary Numan, Marlon Wayans, Kasabian, Labrinth, David Gandy and Conor Maynard.
 
Our garments have been featured in GQ, Gay Times, Wonderland, Vogue China and on the cover of LA Fashion Magazine.

contact.summary:
Imagine if your plant was more reliable, more profitable, and safer. Imagine how much more you could do with your current team and resources if you could increase maintenance productivity by 35%. 

No more firefighting and chasing parts. Instead, all jobs are thoroughly planned, scheduled, and executed efficiently on time.

No more repeat failures. You fix forever, rather than forever fixing.

No more useless PMs that just waste your resources and budget, yet do little to improve reliability. Instead, you understand your equipment's failure modes and have identified cost-effective tasks to deal with them.

◾️ What will it take to improve reliability, profit, and safety in your plant?

You need a simple, effective, and PROVEN framework that teaches your team what they need to know, with all the tools to help you implement the essential elements of reliability. 
 
And that’s exactly what we offer to our clients at the Road to Reliability™

◾️ What is the Road to Reliability™

A simple 4 step program that offers plant managers the most cost-effective and sustainable approach to improving and maintaining plant reliability, profit, and safety. 

Working in an environment like this is stimulating. The culture is strong and positive. The relationships are trusting and you can put your energy into improving things. It's an environment in which the people and the plant thrive. 

Not many plants around the world operate in an environment like this. 

But it’s possible and there's less stopping you than you might think.

◾️ See what our students are saying

“Highly recommend it to any person or company endeavoring to advance their company’s maintenance efficiency and productivity.”

“Erik explains everything with a wealth of knowledge”

“An excellent course worth every single penny. I wholeheartedly recommend it to all practitioners, beginners and mature maintenance or operations managers alike, as everyone can benefit from it”

profile_positions.description:
Thousands of industrial plants around the world struggle with low reliability and high
maintenance costs. Despite the principles of effective maintenance and good reliability having
been known for decades, only a few organizations have successfully achieved high reliability and sustained top quartile maintenance costs. The core reasons for this poor performance are:

(1) Reliability is made too complex, and organisations lose focus of what actually matters i.e.
the ‘basics’ of planning & scheduling, preventive maintenance, and defect elimination

(2) Organisations lack knowledge of these basics and often don’t engage external
consultants because of the high costs involved

(3) Organisations too often fail at implementing the basics effectively and as a result, don’t
achieve the performance improvements they should

By Making Reliability Simple™ for our clients and training their teams to implement the required
improvements using just their own staff whilst applying our proven frameworks, we offer a unique,
highly cost-effective approach that helps our clients improve their bottom line.

Our clients are primarily Plant Managers and Maintenance Managers in medium-sized asset-intensive industries who want to make their plants more reliable, more profitable and safer.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
The PS100 Implementing Maintenance Planning & Scheduling online training course provides you and your team not only with the knowledge and understanding of how planning & scheduling should work in an industrial environment, but also how to implement it so you achieve sustainable improvements.

Throughout this online self-paced course, we help you to understand how planning & scheduling will add value to your business. And we teach you how to implement planning & scheduling using a proven framework that combines both project management and change management principles. Implementing Maintenance Planning & Scheduling will improve your maintenance productivity and is often the first step you need to take on the Road to Reliability™.

zFull.summary:
Imagine if your plant was more reliable, more profitable, and safer. Imagine how much more you could do with your current team and resources if you could increase maintenance productivity by 35%. 

No more firefighting and chasing parts. Instead, all jobs are thoroughly planned, scheduled, and executed efficiently on time.

No more repeat failures. You fix forever, rather than forever fixing.

No more useless PMs that just waste your resources and budget, yet do little to improve reliability. Instead, you understand your equipment's failure modes and have identified cost-effective tasks to deal with them.

◾️ What will it take to improve reliability, profit, and safety in your plant?

You need a simple, effective, and PROVEN framework that teaches your team what they need to know, with all the tools to help you implement the essential elements of reliability. 
 
And that’s exactly what we offer to our clients at the Road to Reliability™

◾️ What is the Road to Reliability™

A simple 4 step program that offers plant managers the most cost-effective and sustainable approach to improving and maintaining plant reliability, profit, and safety. 

Working in an environment like this is stimulating. The culture is strong and positive. The relationships are trusting and you can put your energy into improving things. It's an environment in which the people and the plant thrive. 

Not many plants around the world operate in an environment like this. 

But it’s possible and there's less stopping you than you might think.

◾️ See what our students are saying

“Highly recommend it to any person or company endeavoring to advance their company’s maintenance efficiency and productivity.”

“Erik explains everything with a wealth of knowledge”

“An excellent course worth every single penny. I wholeheartedly recommend it to all practitioners, beginners and mature maintenance or operations managers alike, as everyone can benefit from it”

◾️ Interested? 

Ping me a message here on LinkedIn.

Schedule a call: https://reliabilityacademy.com/schedule-a-call

Or reach out:

contact.summary:
If you're a mid-level job seeker considering a career change, then you know: 

1) You need to be clear on your "what's next"
2) You need a cohesive resume & LinkedIn page
3) You need to define and identify a target audience
4) You need to boost your visibility to draw them to you

and 

5) Building a search strategy is complex and time-intensive

Not using LinkedIn as part of your job search strategy is a missed opportunity.

Your peers already leverage their LinkedIn profiles and engage with their target audience to stand out, attract recruiters and employers, gain trust, establish credibility, and build authority in their chosen fields.

Some have even boosted their visibility further by sharing LinkedIn content related to their expertise (I know because some of them are my clients).

As your career coaching partner, I will ensure that you:

– Save time by developing a resume aligned with your "what's next"
– Develop a cohesive LinkedIn profile to reinforce your vision
– Build an audience of peers, employers, and recruiters
– Create an engagement strategy to draw them in
– Position yourself clearly and effectively
– Amplify your reach in your market

Leaders, Executives, and Financiers from top firms trust me with their job search.

Peter Licavoli said, "Working with David and opting for the Total Career Blueprint package was one of the best decisions I've made for my professional growth. His ability to listen, synthesize, and provide actionable guidance is unparalleled."

Moriah Iverson said, "David was a significant asset to my job search. I connected with him immediately. He supported and coached me through a "what do I want to do next" major transition. I followed his strategies exactly and landed a dream job offer in less than 3 months."

Anthony Cannizzo said, "David's mantra of 'being relatable' is something I carry with me everyday in my professional life. David was able to quickly identify my areas of strength and areas of improvement and coached me how to use both to my advantage."

Imagine being able to work on building your network or getting job leads in your DM's instead of guessing how many times you'll be ghosted — or worse, whether or not you'll have to keep dumping money into costly resume templates or outdated coaching.

I'll save you time and build your total career blueprint so you get:

↳ A job search your audience trusts
↳ A job search your audience notices
↳ A job search to find your 'what's next'

Send me a DM if you'd like to know how it works. 
Or, you can email me here: david@whitepath.co

profile_positions.description:
Picture a world where you're expanding your network and receiving job leads directly into your inbox – no more worrying about being ignored or squandering money on expensive resume templates or obsolete coaching advice.

As a former $4m NYC full-desk agency recruiter turned career coach, I help mid-level professionals build and develop targeted job search strategies that align with their "what's next."

Leveraging a 20-year HR and recruiting career into founding a 6-figure and industry-leading career coaching agency within its first 12 months, I have committed to helping mid-level professionals navigate their career transitions and reach their ultimate goals. 

I offer a range of services, including personalized coaching sessions, resume overhauls, interview training, and customized LinkedIn branding and networking strategies.

Whatever your unique needs and goals are, I work with you to create tailored plans for boosting your online professional branding, expanding your job search skills, or clarifying your career path. 

With a client-centric approach and a commitment to providing actionable guidance, White Path Career Coaching empowers individuals to take control of their careers and achieve personal and professional fulfillment.

contact.summary:
As a recruiting agency or HR leader you've got three choices on how you & your team use LinkedIn content to attract top talent & new biz:

1. Have a LinkedIn company page. Post job openings from it.
2. Have a LinkedIn company page. Post job openings from it. Ask your team to engage & share.  

OR....

3. Equip & train your team to create *their own* content and build *their own* reputation on LinkedIn.

#1 is kidding themselves.
#2 is spinning their wheels. 

But #3..?

Well, #3 is becoming a complete talent (& demand) magnet.

My guess is you'd love to become #3, right? 

Harsh truth:

Most recruiting agencies & talent teams are doing LinkedIn completely wrong. 

❌ They use LinkedIn solely as a job board and cold sourcing CRM. 
❌ They only post promotional content from their company page. 

But here's the deal:

🔥 LinkedIn works best when your recruiters are gifted the time and tools to build their own personal brand on LinkedIn. 

Here's what you really want as a talent leader:

✨ To hire and retain top talent for you & your clients so you can keep growing.
✨ To increase your company's brand awareness & demand.
✨ The competitive edge. 

Here's what your team needs to make this a reality:

They need YOU to give them the permission, training & tools to build their own reputation on LinkedIn. 

Period.

This is where I come in. 

Hi y'all! I'm Katelyn. As a talent acquisition & LinkedIn lead gen expert for recruiting agencies and talent teams, my sweet spot is helping your recruiters become their niche's favorite content creator on LinkedIn all while filling your company's talent & business development pipelines. 

Here's how we can work together:

✨ 4 Week LinkedIn Bootcamp + Monthly Support for 1 year

I partner with you & your team to build meaningful personal brands on LinkedIn that in turn get more eyeballs on your company, fill your talent & sales pipelines + create an employer brand for you where everyone wants to work and no one wants to leave. 

---

Are you a new creator looking for a way to use your professional dev budget? 👇

✨ Group Coaching for New Creators

Ready to launch a new side hustle? Job searching? My 5 Week Content Creation Cohorts utilize the power of community + weekly coaching to get you launched building your confidence, your profile, your audience, your systems, and your writing skills for long-term success here- whatever your LinkedIn goals might be! 

GET STARTED:

zFull.summary:
As a recruiting agency or HR leader you've got three choices on how you & your team use LinkedIn content to attract top talent & new biz:

1. Have a LinkedIn company page. Post job openings from it.
2. Have a LinkedIn company page. Post job openings from it. Ask your team to engage & share.  

OR....

3. Equip & train your team to create *their own* content and build *their own* reputation on LinkedIn.

#1 is kidding themselves.
#2 is spinning their wheels. 

But #3..?

Well, #3 is becoming a complete talent (& demand) magnet.

My guess is you'd love to become #3, right? 

Harsh truth:

Most recruiting agencies & talent teams are doing LinkedIn completely wrong. 

❌ They use LinkedIn solely as a job board and cold sourcing CRM. 
❌ They only post promotional content from their company page. 

But here's the deal:

🔥 LinkedIn works best when your recruiters are gifted the time and tools to build their own personal brand on LinkedIn. 

Here's what you really want as a talent leader:

✨ To hire and retain top talent for you & your clients so you can keep growing.
✨ To increase your company's brand awareness & demand.
✨ The competitive edge. 

Here's what your team needs to make this a reality:

They need YOU to give them the permission, training & tools to build their own reputation on LinkedIn. 

Period.

This is where I come in. 

Hi y'all! I'm Katelyn. As a talent acquisition & LinkedIn lead gen expert for recruiting agencies and talent teams, my sweet spot is helping your recruiters become their niche's favorite content creator on LinkedIn all while filling your company's talent & business development pipelines. 

Here's how we can work together:

✨ 4 Week LinkedIn Bootcamp + Monthly Support for 1 year

I partner with you & your team to build meaningful personal brands on LinkedIn that in turn get more eyeballs on your company, fill your talent & sales pipelines + create an employer brand for you where everyone wants to work and no one wants to leave. 

---

Are you a new creator looking for a way to use your professional dev budget? 👇

✨ Group Coaching for New Creators

Ready to launch a new side hustle? Job searching? My 5 Week Content Creation Cohorts utilize the power of community + weekly coaching to get you launched building your confidence, your profile, your audience, your systems, and your writing skills for long-term success here- whatever your LinkedIn goals might be! 

GET STARTED:
✨ Discovery call link: https://calendly.com/acraftedcareer/discoverycall
✨ Get a free assessment of your current LinkedIn strategy when you book a call

profile_positions.description:
SEO MANAGEMENT:
---------------------
- Managing team of 30 microworkers and in-house SEO Exec;
- Working with in-house dev team via Scrum / Agile methodology;
- Working with in-house product, UX / UI team;
- Working with in-house content team;
- Reporting to CTO


SEO Manager:
Client side roles. Managing SEO Campaigns. Supervising and motivating internal / external SEO team.

Onpage SEO
Working close with inhouse content team. Optimization of selected pages based on factors provided by internal and external tools (Searchmetrics, SEOMoz, etc). Measuring impact based on implemented changes.

Offpage SEO
Link building strategy implementation, review and quality assurance. 
Working close with PR team and social media team. Relevant blog / forum network outreach.

SEO / SEM Strategy
Building SEO / SEM strategy with KPIs based on numbers and factors provided by external / internal seo tools (seoClarity, Searchmetrics, etc).

SEO Analysis & Tracking
Using sitecatalyst, omniture discover, google analytics, cognesia tracker, and other to present website performance on daily/weekly/monthly basis.

Dev Team / Project team
Working close with internal dev team in Agile / Scrum methodology. SEO project allocation on roadmap and implement of onpage changes (PHP, Ruby, MySql).

SEO Expert
Working close with external software teams (Searchmetrics, seoClarity). Using unique methodology for keyword selection (Spearman / Pearson corelation, snapshot keyword selection). Publishing articles on blogs related to SEO.

Presentation Skills
Presenting SEO without jargon in front of company internal team / external customers.

contact.summary:
Follow at: https://www.linkedin.com/company/sccg-management.  Steve is a former Nevada licensed Las Vegas casino owner/executive. Steve invests, advises, consults, and represents gaming clients worldwide in casino development, interactive gaming, and gaming technology endeavors, including sports betting,, esports, and DFS platforms (visit http://stephenacrystalesq.com and http://sccgmanagement.com for current projects). He provides solutions via:

• market access across the USA
capital raising
• investment advice
• sports betting platforms
• fantasy sports platforms
• mergers and acquisitions advice
• governmental affairs and lobbying
• strategic advice
• business consultancy services

Steve stays on the leading edge of the interactive gaming and gambling industry product development, including analytics; CRM; online and mobile bingo, poker, and casino games; DFS and esports; mobile lottery applications; social gaming; online and mobile payment solutions; and parimutuel products and platforms.

His experience includes igaming, land-based casinos, the hospitality industry, tribal gaming, software implementation, interactive gaming, intellectual property, taking companies public, raising capital, launching products, strategic partnerships, new tech innovations, tech transactions, consulting, outsourcing solutions, investing, project management, project development, lobbying, land use, and regulatory and governmental compliance.

Steve has spent over twenty (25) years directly involved in all aspects of the casino and gaming technology industry:

• as an investor and advisor on over $1 Billion dollars of project finance and mergers and acquisitions in the casino/gaming technology space.

• as an attorney representing public and private gaming companies before various state regulatory bodies and jurisdictions

• as a President and CEO of numerous casino holding and public gaming technology companies employing thousands of employees

Please visit http://stephenacrystalesq.com for more information.

SCCG Management is a consultancy that specializes in sports betting, iGaming, sports marketing, affiliate marketing, technology, intellectual property protection, product commercialization, esports, capital formation, M&A, joint ventures, casino management, and governmental and legal affairs for the casino and iGaming industry. SCCG Management celebrates 2022 as its 30th Anniversary of leadership and innovation for the gaming industry.

Please visit https://SCCGManagement.com for more information.

contact.summary:
Founder and CEO of Lean Focus.  For over 25 years, I have been implementing lean business systems in consulting, private equity, commercial, operations, continuous improvement, and senior leadership roles for such companies as Danaher, Coltala Holdings, HNI, Eaton, Argo Consulting, Experian, and Winegard.  

Trained by disciples of the Toyota Production System, I have worked in a Shingo Prize winning facility and am a Shingo Prize Examiner. Over my career I have demonstrated hands-on leadership and facilitation of 500+ kaizen events with over 100 major corporations in 19 different countries.  

I had Danaher Business System (DBS) responsibility for Danaher's Product Identification Platform of operating companies, which won the "Best Plant in the World", two years in a row, Danaher Corporate DBS responsibility for North America, and I was instrumental in developing Danaher’s company-wide Problem-Solving Process.  My experiences inspired me to create a new, comprehensive business system that enables organizations to improve on all fronts—not just Lean. Today, that system is known as the Lean Focus Business System™, and it is not only the foundation on which Lean Focus was formed, it is the method with which businesses all over the world are able to transform for the better, and for the long term.

Industry Experience:
Private Equity, Aerospace / Defense, Automotive, Electronics, Capital Equipment, Chemicals, Protective Packaging, Residential Construction Materials, Water Quality, Dental, Test & Measurement, Sheet Metal Fabrication, Life Sciences, Medical Devices, Oil and Gas, Discrete Manufacturing, Continuous Processing, Make-to-Stock, Make-to-Order, and Engineer-to-Order Systems 

Specialties:
Building/Installing Problem Solving & Kaizen Cultures, Operational Due Diligence, Acquisition Integration, Strategic Planning & Strategy Deployment, Sales Force Efficiency & Effectiveness Tools, Pricing Margin Analysis, Transactional Kaizen, EBITDA focused operational improvements, Cellular Manufacturing, 6S & Visual Management, Standardized Work, Mistake Proofing (Poka Yoke), Visual Controls, Setup Reduction (SMED), Total Productive Maintenance (TPM), Daily Management Processes, Leader Standard Work, Working Capital reduction via Kanban & Pull Based Inventory tools, DSO Reduction, and Accounts Payable processes, Value Analysis & Engineering, 3P, Rapid Product Development

treasury_media.description:
A PROVEN PROCESS
Whether you’re in a turnaround situation, a renewal phase with increased expectations, or a period of rapid expansion, there are times when only an enterprise-wide transformation will do. Our proven process has distilled the critical elements companies need to transform their business for good—it’s what we call a high-performance culture, and it’s what enables our clients to deliver results that are profitable, measurable, and sustainable.
treasury_media.title: Lean Focus | Website

treasury_media.description: TRANSFORMING BUSINESSES FOR GOOD | At Lean Focus, we help businesses overcome their biggest challenges by transforming them for the better, and for the long-term.  A "who's who"​ of global leaders in every industry, our clients include some of the world's most respected brands and several members of the Fortune 1000.
treasury_media.title: Lean Focus | Consulting

treasury_media.description:
At Lean Focus, we help companies accelerate their Lean Transformation by identifying, sourcing, and developing the Lean talent they need to deliver sustained, profitable growth.

Our established industry connections and focused screening approach enables us to assemble and qualify a slate of grade-A Lean Leaders, quickly. Leaders that will help you build the continuous improvement culture it takes to transform your business for good.
treasury_media.title: Lean Focus | Talent Solutions

treasury_media.description: The beating heart of every high-performance culture is a Lean Business System. Which is why, over the course of your Lean Transformation, we’ll build and integrate a custom, results-based business system within your organization—one that connects all your intricate systems and interrelated steps together—enabling you to drive sustained, profitable growth.
treasury_media.title: Lean Focus | Content Licensing

treasury_media.description: Creating value from M&A and post-merger integration depends on making the right strategic decisions and proactively improving the business portfolio over time.  At Lean Focus, we’re not your everyday career consultants—we’re hands-on practitioners that have held top leadership positions in world-class companies.
treasury_media.title: Lean Focus | MA&I Practice - Unlocking Speed to Value™

treasury_media.description: We provide expert guidance to transform Innovation from a reactive, unfocused team that’s become comfortable missing commitments to a strategic business partner that delivers new products on-time that delight customers and deliver growth year after year.

We are senior practitioners of M&A, Strategy, Innovation, Engineering & Technology, Operations, Lean Transformation and Commercialization. We have demonstrated success and established our credentials in global companies of various sizes, at various stages of growth and operating in multiple geographies.  

Companies We Work With:
Our focus is on middle & lower-middle market companies in the Industrial Sector who are seeking new growth and profit expansion opportunities to enhance shareholder value and deliver outsized returns for their investors in a short period. 

How We Create Value:
We drive business transformation to deliver exponential growth and margin expansion.

Our well-honed playbook comprises innovation, digitalization, creation of new business models and the deployment of lean transformation best-practices.

profile_positions.description:
• Developed and deployed an image similarity model to automatically flag fraudulent claims, resulting in the cost savings of $3k per week. The model achieved an AUC of 88.7%, and a 30% recall at an FPR of 0.25%.
• Maintained a daily human-in-the-loop fraud detection pipeline that detects GoFood merchant account takeover using keyword detection with a false positive rate of 1%. 
• Developed an NLP classification model to classify 11 million bilingual free-text retail items into 12 categories with an F1 score of 94%. Sales team used these classifications to create targeted messaging for product upselling.
• Built and monitored the performance of a production time-series model that predicts the weekly activity status of ~10,000 merchants with an F1-score of 90%. Marketing team used the result to reduce merchant churn.
• Built a random forest model that differentiated photos of premium restaurants and run-down eateries with an accuracy of 84% for classifying leads into high-, medium- or low-quality.

profile_positions.description:

• Built and maintained dashboards for north-star metrics like monthly active users and Net Revenue Retention for management, product and business teams.

💡 Follow me for data science content + updates! 

🧑‍🏭 I'm a chemical engineer turned data scientist. I self-learnt everything I needed to become a data analyst/scientist through online courses. 

🤖 At work, I use machine learning and deep learning techniques to fight inappropriate content on the Gojek Merchant App. I use techniques like computer vision, time-series analysis, and natural language processing at work.

I also write about data science and data analytics. I share tips on python, SQL, and Google Sheets that saves me time.

I enjoy sharing my learning journey and knowledge. Let's connect and learn together.

contact.summary:
Hey 👋 I’m Jordan, and I’m the co-founder of Arcade Media. 

We’re on a mission to support a group of lads who we firmly believe are the biggest British cultural export of this generation: The Sidemen. 

Our aim is to help them realise their big ambitions to leave a legacy, and so far we’ve launched three fast growing businesses together: Side+, Sides and XIX Vodka, and had a world of fun along the way.

Previously, I:

- Joined VICE as their youngest ever creative
- Worked with LADbible to help launch their agency Joyride
- Started the first Gen Z agency in the UK, Roundabout, before becoming Chief Creative Officer at YMU (formerly James Grant), Europe’s largest talent management company
- Led creative strategy and innovation for the group, working with clients including Ant and Dec, Take That, Amelia Dimoldenberg, Munya Chawawa and many more
- Founded and chaired the Youth Board for Outernet Global, an immersive entertainment district in the heart of central London

Alongside Arcade, I’m also a keynote speaker, advisor, investor and commentator on all things social and Creator Economy-related. 

Please don’t hesitate to DM or email me here (jordan@arcade.media is the one!) 

Also, if you have a moment, follow me on Twitter (@jordanerschwarz) where I share Sidemen-related thoughts and much more.

Thanks! ✌️

Social Entrepreneurs and Enterprises(SEE) is an initiative of IIT Kanpur Alumni Association and supported by PAN IIT, Alumni Associations of IIM Ahmedabad, IIM Bangalore and IIT Kharagpur.

The Social Enterprise & Entrepreneurship Platform is a network of passionate individuals and institutions (alumni of PAN IIT & IIM) combining their skills and resources in support of key activities to promote social innovation in India. Our united effort provides leadership to advance social innovation, with the ultimate goals to create the measurable social impact.

Startup Master Class (SMC) is a 4-year-old initiative of Alumni Association IIT Kanpur and has now become a Pan-IIT event. To achieve its mandate of fostering and nurturing budding entrepreneurs, it brings together startups, mentors and investors to build interactions and strengthen the network within the entrepreneurial community.

In the spirit of ideas worth spreading, TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. At a TEDx event, TEDTalks video and live speakers combine to spark deep discussion and connection in a small group. These local, self-organized events are branded TEDx, where x = independently organized TED event. The TED Conference provides general guidance for the TEDx program, but individual TEDx events are self-organized. (Subject to certain rules and regulations.)

For me, the biggest leap is to put India on the global map for AI and innovation in marketing and business growth. I aspire to equip brands with robust AI capabilities to help them effortlessly scale their marketing growth. Having had extensive experience working in the FMCG, Telecom, Marketing, and Advertising industries with global brands such as L’oreal, Vodafone, and Unilever, I’m able to accurately identify the pressing brand pain points that can be alleviated with AI.

I’ve been playing to my strengths and driving growth across Europe & APAC, spearheading product innovations and integrations, and building a strong community of AI experts within Pixis. Looking forward to many more achievements!

contact.summary:
Contact: sandy@recruitingcoachingbyzhen.com

Recruiting - I recruit top sales talent for companies across Canada & the U.S. I have a successful track record of placing SDRs and AEs into companies within 30 days. DM me to inquire about having me assist with finding rock star talent. 

Job Seeking / Interview Coaching - Successfully coached many jobseekers to land offers within 30-60 days in their job hunt. I do thorough coaching with my clients through every stage of the interview, tailoring all answers to your target company. To ensure my clients land a role within 30 days, I offer: 
1. Leveraging personal connections - I have a robust network that consists of 40+ companies across the US and Canada to put you infront of hiring managers 
2. Job Lead Generation - I have a set of strategies to source job postings you may not have found otherwise 
3. Teaching jobseekers how to treat their job hunt like a sale

My specialty is helping job seekers who don't have a SaaS sales background, pivot into SDR/ AE roles. 

My Super Powers: Mentoring & Connecting People
📌[MENTORSHIP/SALES ADVICE]  
Being in sales for 5+ years, I still have so much to learn but have a hand full of tips and tricks that keeps me employed in the sales tech space. Happy to mentor any emerging sales professionals or trade sales secrets with veterans 🙋🏻‍♀️ 🌟 
[INTRODUCTIONS TO PEOPLE IN MY NETWORK]
📌 I genuinely enjoy connecting people with each other to further their possible synergies. Happy to make someone’s day by introducing you to someone that could help your professional or personal goals 

🚀 [FUTURE GOALS] 🚀 
My ultimate goal is to be a founder of my own software company one day. In the past 4 years, I have been qualitatively designing a sales training software. I often day dream about the day it launches and the number of sales professionals it can help! With this goal, networking to build a large following on Linkedin is important. I help as many people as I can to curate relationships and connections that will aid my software launch in the future. Super open to connect and chat with anyone in various industries, roles or backgrounds. I am open minded to talk to anyone as I love creating opportunities. Firm believer in an equal give and take interaction to network. The best way to network is to help people. 🙏🏻

I love sales, entrepreneurship and all things that fall under hustles 💪🏻 much enjoy meeting new people and discovering their passions as well. what’s your passion? Let’s connect and chat (I accept all invites)

contact.summary:
Hi! I'm Ruchi, founder of Mentoresult, a mentorship venture where I help students and professionals reach their career goals. I'm a former management consultant at McKinsey & Co. and an alumna of IIM Ahmedabad.

With 1000+ sessions completed, my mentees have cracked MBA admissions at top schools (IIMA, IIMB, IIMC, ISB, FMS, INSEAD and many others) and aced interviews at prestigious companies (McKinsey, BCG, Bain, Goldman Sachs, PwC, Amazon and Google). I've helped mentees take career decisions, polish their resume, prepare roadmaps & kickstart their startup idea.

As a management consultant at McKinsey, I've advised global clients across private equity, financial services, pharma, technology and education.

I scored 99.99%ile in CAT, and headed to IIM Ahmedabad for my MBA, where I was in the top 10% of my class. My academic highlights include all-India ranks across several prestigious exams (AIR 8 in CA - Foundation, perfect 7/7 GPA in B.Com final year, AIR 9 in ICSE). 

Apart from academics, I'm also passionate about debating, and have won the National Parliamentary debate at Mood Indigo (IIT B).

In my free time, I play the guitar and keyboard, make clay miniature art, and write.
---------------------------------------------

Hit the follow button if you'd like to hear more from me :) 📢
Connect with me if you'd like to chat 💬
Mentorship slots open on Mentoresult.com ✔

contact.summary:
Job searching is HARD! Recruiting is HARD! and the job market is fiercely competitive. Anyone who tells you otherwise is not lying and obviously not saying the truth. 

It's easy for your unique talents and aspirations to get lost amidst a sea of faceless resumes and generic LinkedIn profiles. 

You deserve to stand out, but crafting a compelling CV that truly reflects your worth is a daunting challenge. Moreover, as a business owner/Freelancer, you know the importance of a strong corporate image, but finding the right words to captivate clients and partners can feel like an endless puzzle.

Imagine the frustration of submitting countless job applications, only to hear crickets in response. 

Your expertise is undeniable, yet your CV fails to convey the true impact you can make. Or picture the lost opportunities as potential clients scroll past your uninspiring LinkedIn profile, settling on a competitor who skillfully showcases their unique value proposition. 

You have one option and that is to break free from these shackles of underrepresentation and tap into your full potential!

Here is how I can help YOU, 

➡️Elevate Your Personal Brand: This isn't putting words on paper; it's weaving compelling narratives that highlight your unique strengths, experiences, and ambitions. Together, we'll create a powerful personal brand that resonates with employers and leaves a lasting impression.

➡️Corporate Communication that Connects: Words have the power to forge lasting connections. From captivating CVs/resumes to persuasive marketing materials, let's craft messages that leave a lasting impact on your target, driving trust and engagement.

➡️LinkedIn Profile Magic: Your LinkedIn profile is more than just a digital resume – it's a virtual window to your professional identity. I help you establish a magnetic online presence, attracting lucrative opportunities and influential connections.

➡️HR Outsourcing Excellence: Leave your recruiting headaches to me! Let's manage the process, freeing you to focus on what matters most – driving your business forward.

It's simple! 

My true satisfaction lies in your triumphs - committed to empowering you with the tools and confidence you need to thrive in the ever-changing business landscape.

Let's Rewrite Your Success Story Together!

Let me help you step into a world where your unique skills and aspirations are celebrated, where captivating words create a winning formula for success.

Take a step NOW, Let's craft the future you deserve!
Send a direct message.
Email: ngozialado@gmail.com 
WhatsApp: +2348121146650

My vision is to connect the most creative people to the biggest brands, with the largest budgets. Through a mixture of training, coaching and mentoring, my aim is to help my clients build the Creative Agency of their dreams. My key achievements as a Creative Business Coach have been:

► Developing creative solutions for some of the biggest companies in the world including Volvo Trucks, GrandVision and Porsche. Travelled globally, worked with CEOs and managed multi-million-pound projects.
► Growing my agency client pool from c. £25,000/year to £3.5m/year in sales through increasing business reputation as a creative, reliable agency, consistently delivering client results delivering regular wins for our biggest clients.

contact.summary:
Hi, I’m Debonkar, a content writer and copywriter creating content online. Social media has become a comfortable space for me for the last 3 years. I’ve diversified my audience on many platforms. I find joy in working in marketing, personal branding, and social media growth. I have worked with people from creators, life coaches, founders, corporate officials business owners, and influencers.
 
From my love of storybooks, I started to write stories on social media. Now, I’m involved in many projects for different kinds of clients. I’ve worked with 70+ startups, brands, coaches, creators for their content and social media. in the power of content, strategies, and distribution. It empowers your brand, your company’s brand, and your name in your target audience’s mind. It opens life-changing opportunities with time. You can become sure of it.
 
With the power of organic content, I have built a community of 20k people across all channels. Community is a privilege. I always try to educate, entertain and encourage my audience through valuable content.
 
My current work projects include writing content and copies with businesses and startups.
 
For example,
 
•Blogs and articles for brands.
 
•Case studies for startups, research institutes, and coaches.
 
•Stories for life coaches.
 
•Social media posts for personal accounts and company pages.
 
•A different form of document for many niches.
 
•How-to guides.
 
•Listicles for required brands.
 
•Various forms of copies to increase sales, action, and conversion.
 
•Campaigns to launch new products, rebranding, and old services.

•Scripts for Youtube videos, Instagram videos and s, and podcasts.

•Ebooks.
 
And many more.
 
I also helped brands and clients to grow their brands on social media.
A fast-paced environment, work culture, and industry guidance have helped me a lot.
 
I always love to work on new projects and meet new people. I go for new challenges to have better growth in life. I am a creator of a space named Techie Zone on Quora and a local business named 24*7 LOCAL on Instagram and Facebook. I have also a podcast named Debu Talks. I write articles on Medium every month. On my Wordpress blog, I've 50+ followers.

You can find all content at my hashtag #debcreates.  (150+ followers)
 
If you want to hire me, do a collab, ask a question or discuss your project, my DMs are open for you.
 
You can also shoot a mail at: debonkarslg@gmail.com.
 
Will respond asap.

profile_positions.description:
- Back in 2019, I was taking baby steps towards gaining confidence, learning skills, building a network etc.

- I started publishing blogs, getting active on different platforms and my awareness about building a brand happened.

- In 2020, I gained the push of being a content writer and copywriter in the industry. 

- I started marketing my services to more people. I got to know the nature of clients, their requirements, charges, work culture, choices, and their pain points. 

- In 2021, I got to meet several CEOs, coaches, marketing leads, branding heads, influencers, agency owners, influencers, and CXOs. 

- And I served their brand to grow on different social media platforms. I also provided the following services.

1. Content creation: This means building a personal brand, It is about researches, strategies, experiments, audiences and building a system.
 
2. Compelling stories: I have been a pro ins stories. And I'm constantly learning about it.

3. Different kinds of copies:  I wrote copies like web copies, marketing copies, and ad copies to boost brand message, conversions and customer retention.

profile_positions.title: Content Writer and Copywriter

profile_positions.description:
Social media wasn't a comfortable place for me. I hated social media for many reasons. When in 2019, I came to know about Linkedin. I was curious about the platform. I went to ask questions, tried different content formats, engaged with the big influencers, stole the style of Linkedin branding strategists. But it didn't happen as I expected.

Next time, I built relationships, understood the algorithm, researched the target audiences, created user-generated content and went all in. In the journey,  I've built a strong personal brand. I have also grown on platforms like Instagram, Quora, Twitter, Clubhouse, Pinterest, Facebook and many others.

I've built personal brands of founders, coaches, marketing heads, creators and influencers on social media.

Here are the social media services I provide for my clients:

1. Consultancy: I love to consult my clients to set their brand and content strategy according to their ideal platform. 

2. Strategy creation: I create a complete social media strategy for my clients. I help them step by step. I curated the best strategy which will be suitable for their brand goals and identity.

3. Management: I help my clients to manage their social media accounts in the best way possible. 

Through these three steps, I help clients to save their time, money and also earn money through social media.

So, what are you waiting for?

DM now to solve your social media problems and gain gigantic growth.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Marketer

profile_positions.description:
- I came to know about Medium in 2020. I saw many writers, social media strategists, marketers, famous brands, to influencers, are posting articles on Medium as well as on Linkedin. 

-I found Linkedin obviously exclusive for creating my personal brand. 

- Though later, I found Medium useful too. I met a lot of new creators, publications, insights. I also came to know that I can leverage Medium to earn money. 

Even I couldn't say it is tons of money, but I am saying it about monetization. I made deep research about writing on Medium, strategies to get maximum views, claps, shares, and publishes of articles. 

- I found a structure, path,  language to make it possible. 

Now, I write on articles like entertainment, numerology, writing, search engine optimization, metaverse, web3, creator economy, health, wellness, technology, SaaS, and many more topics.

- I'm looking forward to leveling up my number of publications in 2022 and repurposing more content.

Tell me in the DMs.

And till then, click below to check out my latest articles:

profile_positions.description:
I started writing back in the days of 2018. I began to write on my friends' Instagram page about movies, sports, travel, personalities and many more terrific things.

- I went on to create pieces on platforms like Quora, YourQuote and 
Facebook.

-  I also fall in love with blogs of specific niches like marketing, business, health, lifestyle, soft skills, love, relationships and social issues.

- I thought of writing a blog on my own too.

After consulting with some of my friends on social media, I decided to go with Wordpress.com. 

- And I went on to write 20+ blogs in a matter of 3-5 months. I gained magnificent momentum.

- But with time, I have gotten into creating my brand on social media platforms like Linkedin, Quora, Twitter,  Instagram and Medium.

profile_positions.description:

Leverage Linkedin is a Volunteering Project carried out by compassionate & empathetic Linkedin Users globally to help people Learn & Leverage Linkedin for FREE. 

This global community of volunteers is spearheaded to reach out to 6 Million Users & 1000+ professional entities in 200+ countries.

Our Vision is no different from Linkedin - To create economic opportunities for the Global workforce. We believe the Global Workforce will be able to grab economic opportunities more effectively when they are well trained to learn & use Linkedin effectively. 

We aspire to educate Linkedin users in their language of communication through posts, creatives, webinars, recorded pieces of training & more.

▶︎ 𝐖𝐇𝐎 𝐈𝐍𝐈𝐓𝐈𝐀𝐓𝐄𝐃 𝐈𝐓?

Divya Shlokam, CEO of a Content Marketing company, was reached out by 100s of people who lost their jobs and businesses during pandemics. She decided to help at least 1% of Linkedin users, as she had already learned to use Linkedin effectively for her in-bound business growth. So she started giving free education & later 100s of people globally came out to help her as volunteers to support her vision of educating 6 Million people about Linkedin's effective use for FREE. 

▶︎ 𝐇𝐎𝐖 𝐃𝐎 𝐈 𝐄𝐍𝐑𝐎𝐋𝐋? 𝐂𝐀𝐍 𝐈 𝐂𝐎𝐍𝐓𝐑𝐈𝐁𝐔𝐓𝐄 𝐀𝐒 𝐕𝐎𝐋𝐔𝐍𝐓𝐄𝐄𝐑?

volunteer_experiences.description:
Every 5 minutes one American child (many as young as 10 years old) will be abducted and trafficked into the sex trade. 274 children a day. 100,000 each year.  And that estimate could be low. The total current number of human trafficking victims in the US alone reaches into the hundreds of thousands and world-wide into the millions.
All profits from the sale of Amazon Kindle electronic books 1 through 4 are being donated to Good Women International, whose focus is on prevention of sexual exploitation of young women and chil-dren. They support self-empowerment and educational programs world-wide designed to educate our youth to avoid becoming a victim. A recent successful project was an anti-trafficking curricula for our high schools which is now complete.
Enslavement is a reality.  It is documented and it is real. The question is: What are we going to do about it?
To make a donation to Good Women International, a non-profit corporation, go to: www.SupportGoodWomen.com. All donations are tax deductible.

contact.summary:
If you’re a CEO, Director or MD of a multi-level organization and you want to look and feel your best, avoid burnout and be a better role model for your family..

..I have some very bad news 

You’re under pressure at work and home as it is

Your schedule’s packed, you’re stressed out and your energy levels are shot

Caffeine fuelled days of back-to-back meetings followed by a takeaway, some beers and a bit of tele at night is just too easy a habit to fall into. 

Before you know it that’s your normal and you’re left questioning how you ended up like this.

Even with the best of intentions to make changes you find yourself going through fits and starts never really making progress.

Deep down you know something needs to change and you know you can do better but with all the conflicting information online you just don’t know where to start this time

That’s where I come in…

I’m Mike Howarth, founder of The Peak Performance Project and I help high-achieving CEOs to look and feel their best and become better role models for their families in my 1-2-1 transformational coaching experience

Having lost 104lbs myself and coached hundreds of clients just like you I’ve created a proven strategy of mind and body transformation

A former British champion and international weightlifter my highest values are honesty, integrity, and authenticity

My motto is “clients first, clients last”

Check out what they have to say..

“The best decision I’ve made in my entire life, I’m present for my family and hitting my goals in business at the same time” – Pietro Guarino - serial entrepreneur

zFull.summary:
If you’re a CEO, Director or MD of a multi-level organization and you want to look and feel your best, avoid burnout and be a better role model for your family..

..I have some very bad news 

You’re under pressure at work and home as it is

Your schedule’s packed, you’re stressed out and your energy levels are shot

Caffeine fuelled days of back-to-back meetings followed by a takeaway, some beers and a bit of tele at night is just too easy a habit to fall into. 

Before you know it that’s your normal and you’re left questioning how you ended up like this.

Even with the best of intentions to make changes you find yourself going through fits and starts never really making progress.

Deep down you know something needs to change and you know you can do better but with all the conflicting information online you just don’t know where to start this time

That’s where I come in…

contact.summary:
I’m a behavioral finance speaker and brain science blogger. My presentations show how to use the latest brain science insights to avoid costly mistakes.  

I've spent most of my career running a marketing research company where I've taken twisted pleasure in putting people inside of brain scanners. Then I mapped the parts of their brain that lit up when they made important decisions.

I started my career as a network television producer, and I’ve never quite gotten that out of my system. The result is an annoyingly overabundant stream of online videos. I've produced hundreds of ‘em. You can check them out here:

- https://youtube.com/graemenewell

My feed contains videos and articles that show the situations when we’re most vulnerable to making bad decisions. Tap my behavioral science learning library here:

- https://602communications.com/best-practices/

Looking for an overenthusiastic speaker for your next in-person or online event? Have a look at some of my presentations:

- https://602communications.com/graeme-newell-speaking/

Please do reach out and say hello on LinkedIn, and let me know topics for future videos. 

Common Misspellings: Graham Newell, Grame Newell, Graem Newell, Gram Newell

treasury_media.description: Learn how to use the latest brain science insights to make smarter money choices.
treasury_media.title: What is Behavioral Finance?

treasury_media.description: New neuroscience reveals the disturbing fact that pretty much ALL OF US regularly dabble in conspiracy theory thinking. Learn how a cognitive bias called “proportionality bias” distorts our thinking.
treasury_media.title: Why Our Brain Believes Weird Conspiracy Theories

treasury_media.description: We don’t work on things because we love them. We love things because we work on them. It’s a big reason we are so smitten with our hobbies, hometown teams, families, homes, cars and most other things in our lives. When we work hard on something, it becomes a touchstone for our ego.  Learn how the “IKEA Effect” can lure us into making foolish choices.
treasury_media.title: How to Make More Winning Choices

treasury_media.description: How can you make smarter financial decisions? Learn how a cognitive bias called the “availability bias” tricks us into making impetuous money choices.
treasury_media.title: Why Our Brain Makes Foolish Money Choices

profile_positions.description: Using the latest in brain science research, I show the specific situations when we're most vulnerable to making impulsive decisions. I show audiences how to coach themselves and their clients to escape the trap of emotional decision-making. I teach teams research-proven tactics for making smarter decisions.
profile_positions.title: Behavioral Finance Speaker & Virtual Presenter

profile_positions.description: Most important decisions come from the subconscious brain, so I use brain science to uncover the deeply irrational and often hidden reasons that motivate a choice. I worked with businesses to reveal the most powerful emotions and beliefs concealed at the heart of their customer’s identity. Then I trained teams in specific tactics for integrating these powerful psychological drivers into compelling messaging.
profile_positions.title: President of 602 Communications Research & Marketing

profile_positions.description: I managed a television station marketing department including media placement, brand positioning, ad creation, editing and writing.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Director

profile_positions.description: I wrote, produced and edited commercials and TV shows for radio and television networks.
profile_positions.title: Television Producer & Director

volunteer_experiences.description: I serve on the board of directors and mentor speakers in platform skills and business best practices.

My main specialization is launching new products or developing existing ones, improving all key business indicators (DAU, MAU, CAC, CSI, NPS, LTV, CR, and others). Also, have a broad experience in marketing & data.

zFull.summary:
Professional Product Owner and Senior Project Manager with over 10 years of experience in the Fintech,  IT Software Development, and Digital domains. All my products and projects were implemented in an Agile (Scrum, Kanban) format in a complete Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). 

My main specialization is launching new products or developing existing ones, improving all key business indicators (DAU, MAU, CAC, CSI, NPS, LTV, CR, and others). Also, have a broad experience in marketing & data.

Among the achievements in the last few years alone, I would note: 

✅ Implemented 5 large-scale fintech products and completed over 25 projects with an active audience of up to 825 000 users with a budget of up to 10M USD.

✅ Managed a team of up to 40 people (UX and UI Designers, Developers, Business Analysts, Data Analysts, QAs, Project Managers, etc.).

✅ Provided MAU growth by 150% by launching 2 digital government services. The digital share increased to 66%, the average CSI was 8.8, and the average NPS was 39%.

✅  Launched the Big Data analytical center in less than 12 months. Implemented the CDO function in 3 subsidiary banks (Belarus, Kazakhstan, Austria). ROA was increased by 0.2%, and ROE was increased by 1%.
 
My passion is to face product and project management challenges and help to build better products that people and businesses love to use.  

I have a blog with 9 000+ followers where I talk about IT career development: https://t.me/ivandoronin1

📱 Phone:  +90-531-282-38-42
📧 Email: ivan.doronin@gmail.com

► Soft Skills: Skills Solid Excellent organizational skills, including multitasking and time-management | Good interpersonal skills in dealing with peers, vendors & customers |  Leadership ability and a good sense of teamwork and collaboration | Solid interpersonal skills, including the ability to interact clearly with others | Strong communication and presentation skills | Proven strong client-facing skills | Good problem-solving skills | Self-motivated | Highly patient

contact.summary:
Strategic thinker and senior leader who creatively uses technology and resources to support innovation and revenue generating business goals. Has a long track record of successfully completed enterprise scale projects including technology conversions and re-branding through acquisitions, financial adviser desktop development, custom CRM development, report design and an implementation of a sound release management operational framework and practice. Works under tight business, legal, and compliance driven timelines.

Experience includes: Infrastructure project management,  revenue generating sales strategy implementation, custom enterprise software implementations, interaction design, usability testing, internet and corporate branding standards, client acquisition and conversion, client discovery, production support, client surveys, search optimization and marketing, social media, process optimization, agile methodology conversion, release management, change management and process improvement.

Additional Detailed Experience: 
Extensive use of complex functions in Microsoft Excel to extract the data and automate maximum reports to save time and increase efficiency.

Used various tools such as Google Analytics and VWO to get detailed insights about the visitor behavior and to identify the point of maximum drop-offs.

Used SUPERMETRICS to automate the reports that saved immense amount of time and also provided accurate reporting every hour.

Analyzed and improved the various email marketing campaigns based on the subject lines, graphics, open rate, etc. to gauge the effectiveness.

Developed and implemented strategies to improve SEM through SEO in order to rank higher in search engines and drive more organic traffic and sales.

Improved customer acquisition for each company by utilizing e-commerce platforms such as Amazon, eBay, and Google Merchant Center.

contact.titleDescription: Obvi was founded with one objective in mind: present the most obvious choice of transparent products which present real results without having to sacrifice taste. At Obvi, we believe the industry as it is currently, is facing a phenomenon which is known as the paradox of choice; that is, the more choices there are, the less satisfied the customer is starting to become. We have set out to make that choice as obvious and easy for our customers. Simple and transparent formulas with a cutting-edge flavor systems make any Obvi product, the obvious choice.

contact.summary:
Imagine how would it feel to have consistent email sign-ups and inbound leads that ultimately buy your corporate & employee wellness services or products. 

All this is because you have a thoughtful blogging strategy in place that brings regular organic traffic to your business website. 

Hi, I am Shweta: The Wellness writer & On Page SEO Optimization expert. 

Are looking for a writer to create blogs that drive organic traffic and lessen your burden from the constant back and forth of writing content for a business blog? Your search ends now!

————————————————————————————-

I help your Corporate Wellness brands with long-form content and blogging strategy to get them on the 1st page of Google & bring organic traffic through Blog SEO Optimization✍️

Now that you are here, chances are:

- You are a Wellness or Well-being organization providing workplace/corporate wellness services
- Your business model revolves around spreading awareness about holistic wellness in the workplace
- You are a mental wellness enthusiast wanting to improve the present work culture
- You have a corporate wellness business idea you want to bring to life

I am THE writer for YOU if you as a Corporate Wellness business owner looking for:

- A business blogging expert to help you rank your business blog on the 1st page of Google
- An experienced content writer who understands and conveys your brand message with efficiency through evergreen content that makes you stay on the 1st page of Google
- A refined copywriter to tell compelling and engaging stories about your client experiences to your potential customers through thought leadership content 

If you fit into any of the above criteria, I’d love to work with you. Let's chat! 

You love your wellness business and I, as an SEO writer, aim to convey your brand value and vision to your customers through my strategic long-form writing that keeps you on the 1st page of Google. 

You want high-quality, fluff-free content to attract more customers and I'm here to make it happen for you.

————————————————————————————-

Any other business queries? Feel free to DM me or reach out on my business email - writtenbyshweta@gmail.com

-----------------------------------------------------

P.S. If you are an aspiring writer wanting to begin your freelancing journey, make sure you subscribe to The Wellwords Newsletter for weekly tips and insights to learn and implement everything about running a thriving freelance writing business: https://tealfeed.com/writtenbyshweta

profile_positions.description:
As a freelance content writer and copywriter, I write for SERVICE BASED Wellness businesses. 

TRUTH BOMB: The reader doesn't buy your services, they buy the benefits that they can enjoy through your services. 
And, that is exactly what I do with my words. I let them know and believe about the advantages your services offered. When I work with you, I work on your business as I'd do for mine. 

I keep it simple, effective, and concise. 
The NO BULLSHIT writing is what I call it.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Content writer and Copywriter

profile_positions.description: As the lead writer at The Wellness Academy I work closely with, globally recognised preventative medicine and corporate wellness expert, Dr. Dorian Dugmore on his business projects that include wellness audits, wellness programs development, etc. for employee wellness in the workplace.
profile_positions.title: Content Writer

profile_positions.description:
Book your 1:1 Connect with me ✅

Will this 1:1 Connect Call change your life overnight drastically? NO. 

Will it give you a direction to overcome your fears and start as a freelance writer? YES. 

Hi, I am Shweta. I have been working as a freelance writer for the past 2.5 years. 

During this time, I have: 
- worked with top industry clients globally, 
- got my work published on leading niche-specific websites such as wellness.com and Mantra Wellness, and 
- started a self-improvement blog. 

Now, I want to help you become your best version by giving that one chance to yourself as I did once. 

If you want to give your below-average skills a try and leverage them to create a successful career as a freelance writer, this 1:1 Connect Call is for you. 

This personalized session is dedicated to solving your struggles and inhibitions as a freelance writer. 

Along with the answers to all your questions, you will leave with a plan to close your first or next client. Let's do it!

—————————————————————————————

The Wellwords is a newsletter for aspiring freelance writers. If you want to excel in content writing and build a stable freelance business, you are in the right place. This newsletter aims to do two things:
1. Help you improve your writing skills and lifestyle as a freelance writer
2. Help you build your freelance business from scratch as a wellness writer

Both of these will happen with the inside stories from my journey that I haven’t shared before anywhere. These are both the success and failures I have had in my time as a professional writer. It will include real client conversations, their objections, money management as a freelancer, and many more things around the subject of freelancing and wellness writing.
